FFmpeg Kommandoreferenz

Vollständige Übersicht aller Optionen und Filter

Globale Optionen

-h
Typ: string
Parameter: -- print basic options

-h
Typ: string
Parameter: long

-- print more options
-h
Typ: string
Parameter: full

-- print all options (including all format and codec specific options, very long)
-h
Typ: string
Parameter: type=name

-- print all options for the named decoder/encoder/demuxer/muxer/filter/bsf/protocol
-L
Typ: string
Parameter: show license

-h
Typ: string
Parameter: show help

-version
Typ: string
Parameter: show version

-muxers
Typ: string
Parameter: show available muxers

-demuxers
Typ: string
Parameter: show available demuxers

-devices
Typ: string
Parameter: show available devices

-decoders
Typ: string
Parameter: show available decoders

-encoders
Typ: string
Parameter: show available encoders

-filters
Typ: string
Parameter: show available filters

-pix_fmts
Typ: string
Parameter: show available pixel formats

-layouts
Typ: string
Parameter: show standard channel layouts

-sample_fmts
Typ: string
Parameter: show available audio sample formats

-?
Typ: string
Parameter: show help

-help
Typ: string
Parameter: show help

--help
Typ: string
Parameter: show help

-buildconf
Typ: string
Parameter: show build configuration

-formats
Typ: string
Parameter: show available formats

-codecs
Typ: string
Parameter: show available codecs

-bsfs
Typ: string
Parameter: show available bit stream filters

-protocols
Typ: string
Parameter: show available protocols

-dispositions
Typ: string
Parameter: show available stream dispositions

-colors
Typ: string
Parameter: show available color names

-sources
Typ: string
Parameter: list sources of the input device

-sinks
Typ: string
Parameter: list sinks of the output device

-hwaccels
Typ: string
Parameter: show available HW acceleration methods

-v
Typ: string
Parameter: set logging level

-y
Typ: string
Parameter: overwrite output files

-n
Typ: string
Parameter: never overwrite output files

-stats
Typ: string
Parameter: print progress report during encoding

-loglevel
Typ: string
Parameter: set logging level

-report
Typ: string
Parameter: generate a report

-max_alloc
Typ: string
Parameter: set maximum size of a single allocated block

-cpuflags
Typ: string
Parameter: force specific cpu flags

-cpucount
Typ: string
Parameter: force specific cpu count

-hide_banner
Typ: string
Parameter: do not show program banner

-ignore_unknown
Typ: string
Parameter: Ignore unknown stream types

-copy_unknown
Typ: string
Parameter: Copy unknown stream types

-recast_media
Typ: string
Parameter: allow recasting stream type in order to force a decoder of different media type

-benchmark
Typ: string
Parameter: add timings for benchmarking

-benchmark_all
Typ: string
Parameter: add timings for each task

-progress
Typ: string
Parameter: write program-readable progress information

-stdin
Typ: string
Parameter: enable or disable interaction on standard input

-timelimit
Typ: string
Parameter: set max runtime in seconds in CPU user time

-dump
Typ: string
Parameter: dump each input packet

-hex
Typ: string
Parameter: when dumping packets, also dump the payload

-frame_drop_threshold <>
Typ: string
Parameter: frame drop threshold

-copyts
Typ: string
Parameter: copy timestamps

-start_at_zero
Typ: string
Parameter: shift input timestamps to start at 0 when using copyts

-copytb
Typ: string
Parameter: copy input stream time base when stream copying

-dts_delta_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: timestamp discontinuity delta threshold

-dts_error_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: timestamp error delta threshold

-xerror
Typ: string
Parameter: exit on error

-abort_on
Typ: string
Parameter: abort on the specified condition flags

-filter_threads
Typ: string
Parameter: number of non-complex filter threads

-filter_complex
Typ: string
Parameter: create a complex filtergraph

-filter_complex_threads
Typ: string
Parameter: number of threads for -filter_complex

-lavfi
Typ: string
Parameter: create a complex filtergraph

-filter_complex_script
Typ: string
Parameter: deprecated, use -/filter_complex instead

-auto_conversion_filters
Typ: string
Parameter: enable automatic conversion filters globally

-stats_period
Typ: string
Parameter: set the period at which ffmpeg updates stats and -progress output

-debug_ts
Typ: string
Parameter: print timestamp debugging info

-max_error_rate
Typ: string
Parameter: ratio of decoding errors (0.0: no errors, 1.0: 100% errors) above which ffmpeg returns an error instead of success.

-vstats
Typ: string
Parameter: dump video coding statistics to file

-vstats_file
Typ: string
Parameter: dump video coding statistics to file

-vstats_version
Typ: string
Parameter: Version of the vstats format to use.

-sdp_file
Typ: string
Parameter: specify a file in which to print sdp information

-vaapi_device
Typ: string
Parameter: set VAAPI hardware device (DirectX adapter index, DRM path or X11 display name)

-qsv_device
Typ: string
Parameter: set QSV hardware device (DirectX adapter index, DRM path or X11 display name)

-init_hw_device
Typ: string
Parameter: initialise hardware device

-filter_hw_device
Typ: string
Parameter: set hardware device used when filtering

-adrift_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: deprecated, does nothing

-qphist
Typ: string
Parameter: deprecated, does nothing

-vsync <>
Typ: string
Parameter: set video sync method globally; deprecated, use -fps_mode

-f
Typ: string
Parameter: force container format (auto-detected otherwise)

-t
Typ: string
Parameter: stop transcoding after specified duration

-to
Typ: string
Parameter: stop transcoding after specified time is reached

-ss
Typ: string
Parameter: start transcoding at specified time

-bitexact
Typ: string
Parameter: bitexact mode

-thread_queue_size
Typ: string
Parameter: set the maximum number of queued packets from the demuxer

-sseof
Typ: string
Parameter: set the start time offset relative to EOF

-seek_timestamp
Typ: string
Parameter: enable/disable seeking by timestamp with -ss

-accurate_seek
Typ: string
Parameter: enable/disable accurate seeking with -ss

-isync
Typ: string
Parameter: Indicate the input index for sync reference

-itsoffset
Typ: string
Parameter: set the input ts offset

-re <>
Typ: string
Parameter: read input at native frame rate; equivalent to -readrate 1

-readrate
Typ: string
Parameter: read input at specified rate

-readrate_initial_burst
Typ: string
Parameter: The initial amount of input to burst read before imposing any readrate

-dump_attachment[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: extract an attachment into a file

-stream_loop
Typ: string
Parameter: set number of times input stream shall be looped

-find_stream_info
Typ: string
Parameter: read and decode the streams to fill missing information with heuristics

-metadata[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: add metadata

-map <[-]input_file_id[:stream_specifier][,sync_file_id[:stream_specifier]]>
Typ: string
Parameter: set input stream mapping

-map_metadata[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set metadata information of outfile from infile

-map_chapters
Typ: string
Parameter: set chapters mapping

-fs
Typ: string
Parameter: set the limit file size in bytes

-timestamp
Typ: string
Parameter: set the recording timestamp ('now' to set the current time)

-program[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: add program with specified streams

-stream_group[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: add stream group with specified streams and group type-specific arguments

-dframes
Typ: string
Parameter: set the number of data frames to output

-target
Typ: string
Parameter: specify target file type ("vcd", "svcd", "dvd", "dv" or "dv50" with optional prefixes "pal-", "ntsc-" or "film-")

-shortest
Typ: string
Parameter: finish encoding within shortest input

-shortest_buf_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: maximum buffering duration (in seconds) for the -shortest option

-qscale
Typ: string
Parameter: use fixed quality scale (VBR)

-profile
Typ: string
Parameter: set profile

-attach
Typ: string
Parameter: add an attachment to the output file

-muxdelay
Typ: string
Parameter: set the maximum demux-decode delay

-muxpreload
Typ: string
Parameter: set the initial demux-decode delay

-fpre
Typ: string
Parameter: set options from indicated preset file

-c[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: select encoder/decoder ('copy' to copy stream without reencoding)

-filter[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: apply specified filters to audio/video

-codec[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: alias for -c (select encoder/decoder)

-pre[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: preset name

-itsscale[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set the input ts scale

-copyinkf[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: copy initial non-keyframes

-copypriorss[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: copy or discard frames before start time

-frames[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set the number of frames to output

-tag[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: force codec tag/fourcc

-q[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: use fixed quality scale (VBR)

-filter_script[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: deprecated, use -/filter

-reinit_filter[:] <>
Typ: string
Parameter: reinit filtergraph on input parameter changes

-discard[:] <>
Typ: string
Parameter: discard

-disposition[:] <>
Typ: string
Parameter: disposition

-bits_per_raw_sample[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set the number of bits per raw sample

-stats_enc_pre[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: write encoding stats before encoding

-stats_enc_post[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: write encoding stats after encoding

-stats_mux_pre[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: write packets stats before muxing

-stats_enc_pre_fmt[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: format of the stats written with -stats_enc_pre

-stats_enc_post_fmt[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: format of the stats written with -stats_enc_post

-stats_mux_pre_fmt[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: format of the stats written with -stats_mux_pre

-time_base[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set the desired time base hint for output stream (1:24, 1:48000 or 0.04166, 2.0833e-5)

-enc_time_base[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set the desired time base for the encoder (1:24, 1:48000 or 0.04166, 2.0833e-5). two special values are defined - 0 = use frame rate (video) or sample rate (audio),-1 = match source time base

-bsf[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: A comma-separated list of bitstream filters

-max_muxing_queue_size[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: maximum number of packets that can be buffered while waiting for all streams to initialize

-muxing_queue_data_threshold[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set the threshold after which max_muxing_queue_size is taken into account

-r[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: override input framerate/convert to given output framerate (Hz value, fraction or abbreviation)

-aspect[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set aspect ratio (4:3, 16:9 or 1.3333, 1.7777)

-vn
Typ: string
Parameter: disable video

-vcodec
Typ: string
Parameter: alias for -c:v (select encoder/decoder for video streams)

-vf
Typ: string
Parameter: alias for -filter:v (apply filters to video streams)

-b
Typ: string
Parameter: video bitrate (please use -b:v)

-vframes
Typ: string
Parameter: set the number of video frames to output

-fpsmax[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set max frame rate (Hz value, fraction or abbreviation)

-pix_fmt[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set pixel format

-display_rotation[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set pure counter-clockwise rotation in degrees for stream(s)

-display_hflip[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set display horizontal flip for stream(s) (overrides any display rotation if it is not set)

-display_vflip[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set display vertical flip for stream(s) (overrides any display rotation if it is not set)

-rc_override[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: rate control override for specific intervals

-timecode
Typ: string
Parameter: set initial TimeCode value.

-pass[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: select the pass number (1 to 3)

-passlogfile[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: select two pass log file name prefix

-vstats
Typ: string
Parameter: dump video coding statistics to file

-vstats_file
Typ: string
Parameter: dump video coding statistics to file

-vstats_version
Typ: string
Parameter: Version of the vstats format to use.

-intra_matrix[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: specify intra matrix coeffs

-inter_matrix[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: specify inter matrix coeffs

-chroma_intra_matrix[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: specify intra matrix coeffs

-vtag
Typ: string
Parameter: force video tag/fourcc

-fps_mode[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set framerate mode for matching video streams; overrides vsync

-force_fps[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: force the selected framerate, disable the best supported framerate selection

-streamid
Typ: string
Parameter: set the value of an outfile streamid

-force_key_frames[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: force key frames at specified timestamps

-hwaccel[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: use HW accelerated decoding

-hwaccel_device[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: select a device for HW acceleration

-hwaccel_output_format[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: select output format used with HW accelerated decoding

-autorotate[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: automatically insert correct rotate filters

-autoscale[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: automatically insert a scale filter at the end of the filter graph

-apply_cropping[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: select the cropping to apply

-fix_sub_duration_heartbeat[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set this video output stream to be a heartbeat stream for fix_sub_duration, according to which subtitles should be split at random access points

-vpre
Typ: string
Parameter: set the video options to the indicated preset

-top[:] <>
Typ: string
Parameter: deprecated, use the setfield video filter

-qphist
Typ: string
Parameter: deprecated, does nothing

-aq
Typ: string
Parameter: set audio quality (codec-specific)

-ar[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set audio sampling rate (in Hz)

-ac[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set number of audio channels

-an
Typ: string
Parameter: disable audio

-acodec
Typ: string
Parameter: alias for -c:a (select encoder/decoder for audio streams)

-ab
Typ: string
Parameter: alias for -b:a (select bitrate for audio streams)

-af
Typ: string
Parameter: alias for -filter:a (apply filters to audio streams)

-aframes
Typ: string
Parameter: set the number of audio frames to output

-apad[:] <>
Typ: string
Parameter: audio pad

-atag
Typ: string
Parameter: force audio tag/fourcc

-sample_fmt[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set sample format

-channel_layout[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set channel layout

-ch_layout[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set channel layout

-guess_layout_max[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set the maximum number of channels to try to guess the channel layout

-apre
Typ: string
Parameter: set the audio options to the indicated preset

-sn
Typ: string
Parameter: disable subtitle

-scodec
Typ: string
Parameter: alias for -c:s (select encoder/decoder for subtitle streams)

-stag
Typ: string
Parameter: force subtitle tag/fourcc

-fix_sub_duration[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: fix subtitles duration

-canvas_size[:]
Typ: string
Parameter: set canvas size (WxH or abbreviation)

-spre
Typ: string
Parameter: set the subtitle options to the indicated preset

-dcodec
Typ: string
Parameter: alias for -c:d (select encoder/decoder for data streams)

-dn
Typ: string
Parameter: disable data

-b
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E..VA...... set bitrate (in bits/s) (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 200000)
-ab
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E...A...... set bitrate (in bits/s) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 128000)
-bt
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..VA...... Set video bitrate tolerance (in bits/s). In 1-pass mode, bitrate tolerance specifies how far ratecontrol is willing to deviate from the target average bitrate value. This is not related to minimum/maximum bitrate. Lowering tolerance too much has an adverse effect on quality. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 4000000)
-flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

ED.VAS..... (default 0)
-flags2
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

ED.VAS..... (default 0)
-export_side_data
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

ED.VAS..... Export metadata as side data (default 0)
-g
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... set the group of picture (GOP) size (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 12)
-ar
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED..A...... set audio sampling rate (in Hz) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-cutoff
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E...A...... set cutoff bandwidth (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-frame_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E...A...... (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-qcomp
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... video quantizer scale compression (VBR). Constant of ratecontrol equation. Recommended range for default rc_eq: 0.0-1.0 (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0.5)
-qblur
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... video quantizer scale blur (VBR) (from -1 to FLT_MAX) (default 0.5)
-qmin
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... minimum video quantizer scale (VBR) (from -1 to 69) (default 2)
-qmax
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... maximum video quantizer scale (VBR) (from -1 to 1024) (default 31)
-qdiff
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... maximum difference between the quantizer scales (VBR) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 3)
-bf
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... set maximum number of B-frames between non-B-frames (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-b_qfactor
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... QP factor between P- and B-frames (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 1.25)
-bug
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

.D.V....... work around not autodetected encoder bugs (default autodetect)
-strict
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED.VA...... how strictly to follow the standards (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default normal)
-b_qoffset
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... QP offset between P- and B-frames (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 1.25)
-err_detect
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

ED.VAS..... set error detection flags (default 0)
-maxrate
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E..VA...... maximum bitrate (in bits/s). Used for VBV together with bufsize. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-minrate
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E..VA...... minimum bitrate (in bits/s). Most useful in setting up a CBR encode. It is of little use otherwise. (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-bufsize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..VA...... set ratecontrol buffer size (in bits) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-i_qfactor
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... QP factor between P- and I-frames (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default -0.8)
-i_qoffset
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... QP offset between P- and I-frames (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-dct
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... DCT algorithm (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default auto)
-lumi_mask
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... compresses bright areas stronger than medium ones (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-tcplx_mask
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... temporal complexity masking (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-scplx_mask
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... spatial complexity masking (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-p_mask
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... inter masking (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-dark_mask
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... compresses dark areas stronger than medium ones (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-idct
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED.V....... select IDCT implementation (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default auto)
-ec
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

.D.V....... set error concealment strategy (default guess_mvs+deblock)
-aspect
Typ: string
Parameter: <rational>

E..V....... sample aspect ratio (from 0 to 10) (default 0/1)
-sar
Typ: string
Parameter: <rational>

E..V....... sample aspect ratio (from 0 to 10) (default 0/1)
-debug
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

ED.VAS..... print specific debug info (default 0)
-dia_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... diamond type & size for motion estimation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-last_pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... amount of motion predictors from the previous frame (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-pre_dia_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... diamond type & size for motion estimation pre-pass (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-subq
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... sub-pel motion estimation quality (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 8)
-me_range
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... limit motion vectors range (1023 for DivX player) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-global_quality
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..VA...... (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-mbd
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... macroblock decision algorithm (high quality mode) (from 0 to 2) (default simple)
-rc_init_occupancy
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... number of bits which should be loaded into the rc buffer before decoding starts (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-threads
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED.VA...... set the number of threads (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-dc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... intra_dc_precision (from -8 to 16) (default 0)
-nssew
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... nsse weight (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 8)
-skip_top
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... number of macroblock rows at the top which are skipped (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_bottom
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... number of macroblock rows at the bottom which are skipped (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..VA...... (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default unknown)
-level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..VA...... encoding level, usually corresponding to the profile level, codec-specific (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default unknown)
-lowres
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.VA...... decode at 1= 1/2, 2=1/4, 3=1/8 resolutions (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-cmp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... full-pel ME compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default sad)
-subcmp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... sub-pel ME compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default sad)
-mbcmp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... macroblock compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default sad)
-ildctcmp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... interlaced DCT compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default vsad)
-precmp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... pre motion estimation compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default sad)
-mblmin
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... minimum macroblock Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 1 to 32767) (default 236)
-mblmax
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... maximum macroblock Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 1 to 32767) (default 3658)
-skip_loop_filter
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... skip loop filtering process for the selected frames (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default default)
-skip_idct
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... skip IDCT/dequantization for the selected frames (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default default)
-skip_frame
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... skip decoding for the selected frames (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default default)
-bidir_refine
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... refine the two motion vectors used in bidirectional macroblocks (from 0 to 4) (default 1)
-keyint_min
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... minimum interval between IDR-frames (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 25)
-refs
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... reference frames to consider for motion compensation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-trellis
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..VA...... rate-distortion optimal quantization (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-mv0_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 256)
-compression_level
Typ: string
Parameter: E..VA...... (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-ch_layout
Typ: string
Parameter: <channel_layout> ED..A......

-rc_max_vbv_use
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... (from 0 to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_min_vbv_use
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... (from 0 to FLT_MAX) (default 3)
-ticks_per_frame
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED.VA...... (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-color_primaries
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED.V....... color primaries (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default unknown)
-color_trc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED.V....... color transfer characteristics (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default unknown)
-colorspace
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED.V....... color space (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default unknown)
-color_range
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED.V....... color range (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default unknown)
-chroma_sample_location
Typ: string
Parameter: ED.V....... chroma sample location (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default unknown)

-slices
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... set the number of slices, used in parallelized encoding (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-thread_type
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

ED.VA...... select multithreading type (default slice+frame)
-audio_service_type
Typ: string
Parameter: E...A...... audio service type (from 0 to 8) (default ma)

-request_sample_fmt
Typ: string
Parameter: <sample_fmt>

.D..A...... sample format audio decoders should prefer (default none)
-sub_charenc
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D...S..... set input text subtitles character encoding
-sub_charenc_mode
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

.D...S..... set input text subtitles character encoding mode (default 0)
-apply_cropping
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D.V....... (default true)
-skip_alpha
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D.V....... Skip processing alpha (default false)
-field_order
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED.V....... Field order (from 0 to 5) (default 0)
-dump_separator
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED.VAS..... set information dump field separator
-codec_whitelist
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D.VAS..... List of decoders that are allowed to be used
-max_pixels
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED.VAS..... Maximum number of pixels (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default INT_MAX)
-max_samples
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED..A...... Maximum number of samples (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default INT_MAX)
-hwaccel_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

.D.V....... (default ignore_level)
-extra_hw_frames
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... Number of extra hardware frames to allocate for the user (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-discard_damaged_percentage
Typ: string
Parameter: .D.V....... Percentage of damaged samples to discard a frame (from 0 to 100) (default 95)

-side_data_prefer_packet [
Typ: string
Parameter: ].D.VAS..... Comma-separated list of side data types for which user-supplied (container) data is preferred over coded bytestream

-mpv_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders. (default 0)
-luma_elim_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-chroma_elim_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-quantizer_noise_shaping
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-error_rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-qsquish
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function) (from 0 to 99) (default 0)
-rc_qmod_amp
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... experimental quantizer modulation (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_qmod_freq
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... experimental quantizer modulation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_eq
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
-rc_init_cplx
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... initial complexity for 1-pass encoding (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_buf_aggressivity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... currently useless (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 1)

-border_mask
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-lmin
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... minimum Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 236)
-lmax
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... maximum Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 3658)
-skip_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_factor
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip factor (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_exp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip exponent (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_cmp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default dctmax)
-sc_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Scene change threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-noise_reduction
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Noise reduction (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-ps
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... RTP payload size in bytes (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-huffman
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Huffman table strategy (from 0 to 1) (default optimal)
-force_duplicated_matrix
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming. (default false)

-dpi
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set image resolution (in dots per inch) (from 0 to 65536) (default 0)
-dpm
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set image resolution (in dots per meter) (from 0 to 65536) (default 0)
-pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Prediction method (from 0 to 5) (default none)
-quality
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... set quality (from 0 to 12) (default film3+)
-max_extra_cb_iterations
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Max extra codebook recalculation passes, more is better and slower (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 2)

-skip_empty_cb
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Avoid wasting bytes, ignore vintage MacOS decoder (default false)
-max_strips
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Limit strips/frame, vintage compatible is 1..3, otherwise the more the better (from 1 to 32) (default 3)
-min_strips
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Enforce min strips/frame, more is worse and faster, must be <= max_strips (from 1 to 32) (default 1)
-strip_number_adaptivity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... How fast the strip number adapts, more is slightly better, much slower (from 0 to 31) (default 0)

-dither_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Dither type (from 0 to 2) (default 1)
-nitris_compat
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... encode with Avid Nitris compatibility (default false)
-ibias
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... intra quant bias (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from 0 to 5) (default dnxhd)
-quant_deadzone
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Quantizer dead zone (from 0 to 1024) (default 7)
-format
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from 1.14664e+09 to 1.14664e+09) (default dxt1)
-compression
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... set compression type (from 0 to 3) (default none)
-format
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... set pixel type (from 1 to 2) (default float)
-gamma
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... set gamma (from 0.001 to FLT_MAX) (default 1)
-slicecrc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Protect slices with CRCs (default auto)
-coder
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Coder type (from -2 to 2) (default rice)
-context
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Context model (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-context
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set per-frame huffman tables (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-non_deterministic
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Allow multithreading for e.g. context=1 at the expense of determinism (default false)

-pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Prediction method (from 0 to 2) (default left)
-mpv_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders. (default 0)
-luma_elim_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

E..V....... RTP payload size in bytes (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-motion_est
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... motion estimation algorithm (from 0 to 2) (default epzs)
-mepc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 256)
-mepre
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... pre motion estimation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-intra_penalty
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Penalty for intra blocks in block decision (from 0 to 1.07374e+09) (default 0)
-gifflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... set GIF flags (default offsetting+transdiff)
-gifimage
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... enable encoding only images per frame (default false)
-global_palette
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... write a palette to the global gif header where feasible (default true)

Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders. (default 0)

Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Penalty for intra blocks in block decision (from 0 to 1.07374e+09) (default 0)
-non_deterministic
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Allow multithreading for e.g. context=1 at the expense of determinism (default false)

-pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Prediction method (from 0 to 2) (default left)
-format
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Codec Format (from 0 to 1) (default jp2)
-tile_width
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Tile Width (from 1 to 1.07374e+09) (default 256)
-tile_height
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Tile Height (from 1 to 1.07374e+09) (default 256)
-pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... DWT Type (from 0 to 1) (default dwt97int)
-sop
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... SOP marker (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-eph
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... EPH marker (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-prog
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Progression Order (from 0 to 4) (default lrcp)
-layer_rates
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Layer Rates
-pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Prediction method (from 0 to 2) (default left)
-pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Prediction method (from 1 to 3) (default left)
-pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Prediction method (from 1 to 3) (default left)
-mpv_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders. (default 0)
-luma_elim_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-chroma_elim_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-quantizer_noise_shaping
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-error_rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-qsquish
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function) (from 0 to 99) (default 0)
-rc_qmod_amp
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... experimental quantizer modulation (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_qmod_freq
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... experimental quantizer modulation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_eq
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
-rc_init_cplx
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... initial complexity for 1-pass encoding (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_buf_aggressivity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... currently useless (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 1)

-border_mask
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-lmin
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... minimum Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 236)
-lmax
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... maximum Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 3658)
-skip_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_factor
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip factor (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_exp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip exponent (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_cmp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default dctmax)
-sc_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Scene change threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-noise_reduction
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Noise reduction (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-ps
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... RTP payload size in bytes (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-huffman
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Huffman table strategy (from 0 to 1) (default optimal)
-force_duplicated_matrix
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming. (default false)

-gop_timecode
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... MPEG GOP Timecode in hh:mm:ss[:;.]ff format. Overrides timecode_frame_start.
-drop_frame_timecode
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Timecode is in drop frame format. (default false)

-scan_offset
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Reserve space for SVCD scan offset user data. (default false)
-timecode_frame_start
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... GOP timecode frame start number, in non-drop-frame format (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)

-b_strategy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-b_sensitivity
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1 (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 40)
-brd_scale
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision (from 0 to 3) (default 0)
-mpv_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders. (default 0)
-luma_elim_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-chroma_elim_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-quantizer_noise_shaping
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-error_rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-qsquish
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function) (from 0 to 99) (default 0)
-rc_qmod_amp
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... experimental quantizer modulation (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_qmod_freq
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... experimental quantizer modulation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_eq
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.

E..V....... initial complexity for 1-pass encoding (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)

Typ: string

E..V....... increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)

E..V....... minimum Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 236)

Typ: integer

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip factor (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip exponent (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default dctmax)

Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Scene change threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Noise reduction (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-ps
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... RTP payload size in bytes (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-motion_est
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... motion estimation algorithm (from 0 to 2) (default epzs)
-mepc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 256)
-mepre
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... pre motion estimation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-intra_penalty
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Penalty for intra blocks in block decision (from 0 to 1.07374e+09) (default 0)
-gop_timecode
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... MPEG GOP Timecode in hh:mm:ss[:;.]ff format. Overrides timecode_frame_start.
-drop_frame_timecode
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Timecode is in drop frame format. (default false)

-scan_offset
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Reserve space for SVCD scan offset user data. (default false)
-timecode_frame_start
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... GOP timecode frame start number, in non-drop-frame format (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)

-b_strategy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-b_sensitivity
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1 (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 40)
-brd_scale
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision (from 0 to 3) (default 0)
-intra_vlc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use MPEG-2 intra VLC table. (default false)
-non_linear_quant
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use nonlinear quantizer. (default false)
-alternate_scan
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable alternate scantable. (default false)
-a53cc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use A53 Closed Captions (if available) (default true)
-seq_disp_ext
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Write sequence_display_extension blocks. (from -1 to 1) (default auto)
-video_format
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Video_format in the sequence_display_extension indicating the source of the video. (from 0 to 7) (default unspecified)
-mpv_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders. (default 0)
-luma_elim_threshold
Typ: string

Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
-rc_init_cplx
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... initial complexity for 1-pass encoding (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_buf_aggressivity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... currently useless (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 1)

-border_mask
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-lmin
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... minimum Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 236)
-lmax
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... maximum Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 3658)
-skip_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_factor
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip factor (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_exp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip exponent (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_cmp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default dctmax)
-sc_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Scene change threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-noise_reduction
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Noise reduction (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-ps
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... RTP payload size in bytes (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-motion_est
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... motion estimation algorithm (from 0 to 2) (default epzs)
-mepc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 256)
-mepre
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... pre motion estimation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-intra_penalty
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Penalty for intra blocks in block decision (from 0 to 1.07374e+09) (default 0)
-dpi
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set image resolution (in dots per inch) (from 0 to 65536) (default 0)
-dpm
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set image resolution (in dots per meter) (from 0 to 65536) (default 0)
-pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Prediction method (from 0 to 5) (default none)
-vendor
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... vendor ID (default "fmpg")
-vendor
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... vendor ID (default "fmpg")
-mbs_per_slice
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... macroblocks per slice (from 1 to 8) (default 8)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from -1 to 5) (default auto)
-vendor
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... vendor ID (default "Lavc")
-bits_per_mb
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... desired bits per macroblock (from 0 to 8192) (default 0)
-quant_mat
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... quantiser matrix (from -1 to 6) (default auto)
-alpha_bits
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... bits for alpha plane (from 0 to 16) (default 16)
-quake3_compat
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Whether to respect known limitations in Quake 3 decoder (default true)
-skip_frame_thresh
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... (from 0 to 24) (default 1)

-start_one_color_thresh
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... (from 0 to 24) (default 1)

-continue_one_color_thresh
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... (from 0 to 24) (default 0)

-sixteen_color_thresh
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... (from 0 to 24) (default 1)

-mpv_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders. (default 0)
-luma_elim_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-chroma_elim_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-quantizer_noise_shaping
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-error_rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-qsquish
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function) (from 0 to 99) (default 0)
-rc_qmod_amp
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... experimental quantizer modulation (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_qmod_freq
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... experimental quantizer modulation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_eq
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Only do ME/MC (I frames -> ref, P frame -> ME+MC). (default false)

Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Skip final bitstream writeout. (default false)

E..V....... Penalty for intra blocks in block decission (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

Parameter: <int>

Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Prediction method (from 0 to 3) (default left)

Parameter: <int>

Typ: string
Parameter: <double>

E..V....... Max undershoot in percent (from 0 to 45) (default 5)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Slice width (from 32 to 1024) (default 32)
-slice_height
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Slice height (from 8 to 1024) (default 16)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Transform depth (from 1 to 5) (default 4)

Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Transform type (from 0 to 7) (default 9_7)

Parameter: <int>

Typ: integer

E..V....... Frame skip exponent (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-skip_cmp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame skip compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default dctmax)
-sc_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Scene change threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-noise_reduction
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Noise reduction (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-ps
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... RTP payload size in bytes (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-motion_est
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... motion estimation algorithm (from 0 to 2) (default epzs)
-mepc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 256)
-mepre
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... pre motion estimation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-intra_penalty
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Penalty for intra blocks in block decision (from 0 to 1.07374e+09) (default 0)
-aac_coder
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E...A...... Coding algorithm (from 0 to 2) (default twoloop)
-aac_ms
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E...A...... Force M/S stereo coding (default auto)
-aac_is
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E...A...... Intensity stereo coding (default true)
-aac_pns
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E...A...... Perceptual noise substitution (default true)
-aac_tns
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E...A...... Temporal noise shaping (default true)
-aac_ltp
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E...A...... Long term prediction (default false)
-aac_pred
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E...A...... AAC-Main prediction (default false)
-aac_pce
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E...A...... Forces the use of PCEs (default false)
-center_mixlev
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E...A...... Center Mix Level (from 0 to 1) (default 0.594604)
-surround_mixlev
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E...A...... Surround Mix Level (from 0 to 1) (default 0.5)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E...A...... Mixing Level (from -1 to 111) (default -1)

Parameter: <int>

E...A...... Room Type (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

E...A...... Expected packet loss percentage (from 0 to 100) (default 0)

Parameter: <boolean>

E...A...... Enable inband FEC. Expected packet loss must be non-zero (default false)

Parameter: <int>

E...A...... Variable bit rate mode (from 0 to 2) (default on)

Parameter: <int>

Parameter: <boolean>

E...A...... Apply intensity stereo phase inversion (default true)

Parameter: <int>

E...A...... Use average bit rate (from 0 to 1) (default 0)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E...A...... Set quality value (0 to 10) for CBR (from 0 to 10) (default 8)

Typ: string
Parameter: E...A...... Number of frames to encode in each packet (from 1 to 8) (default 1)

-vad
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E...A...... Voice Activity Detection (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-dtx
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E...A...... Discontinuous Transmission (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-dtx
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E...A...... Allow DTX (generate comfort noise) (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-iblock
Typ: string
Parameter: <double>

E...A...... Sets the impulse block bias (from -15 to 0) (default 0)
-lag-in-frames
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of frames to look ahead for alternate reference frame selection (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-arnr-maxframes
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction max frame count (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-arnr-strength
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction filter strength (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-arnr-type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction filter type (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-tune
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Tune the encoding to a specific scenario (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-deadline
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Time to spend encoding, in microseconds. (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default good)
-error-resilient
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... Error resilience configuration (default 0)
-max-intra-rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum I-frame bitrate (pct) 0=unlimited (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-crf
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Select the quality for constant quality mode (from -1 to 63) (default -1)
-static-thresh
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... A change threshold on blocks below which they will be skipped by the encoder (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-drop-threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame drop threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-noise-sensitivity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Noise sensitivity (from 0 to 4) (default 0)

-undershoot-pct
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Datarate undershoot (min) target (%) (from -1 to 100) (default -1)
-overshoot-pct
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Datarate overshoot (max) target (%) (from -1 to 1000) (default -1)
-ts-parameters
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E..V....... Temporal scaling configuration using a :-separated list of key=value parameters

-auto-alt-ref
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Enable use of alternate reference frames (2-pass only) (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-cpu-used
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Quality/Speed ratio modifier (from -16 to 16) (default 1)
-screen-content-mode
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Encoder screen content mode (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

-speed
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from -16 to 16) (default 1)
-quality
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default good)
-vp8flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... (default 0)
-arnr_max_frames
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction max frame count (from 0 to 15) (default 0)
-arnr_strength
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction filter strength (from 0 to 6) (default 3)
-arnr_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction filter type (from 1 to 3) (default 3)
-rc_lookahead
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of frames to look ahead for alternate reference frame selection (from 0 to 25) (default 25)
-sharpness
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Increase sharpness at the expense of lower PSNR (from -1 to 7) (default -1)
-lag-in-frames
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of frames to look ahead for alternate reference frame selection (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-arnr-maxframes
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction max frame count (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-arnr-strength
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction filter strength (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-arnr-type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction filter type (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-tune
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Tune the encoding to a specific scenario (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-deadline
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Time to spend encoding, in microseconds. (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default good)
-error-resilient
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... Error resilience configuration (default 0)
-max-intra-rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum I-frame bitrate (pct) 0=unlimited (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-crf
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Select the quality for constant quality mode (from -1 to 63) (default -1)
-static-thresh
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... A change threshold on blocks below which they will be skipped by the encoder (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-drop-threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Frame drop threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-noise-sensitivity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Noise sensitivity (from 0 to 4) (default 0)

-undershoot-pct
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Datarate undershoot (min) target (%) (from -1 to 100) (default -1)
-overshoot-pct
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Datarate overshoot (max) target (%) (from -1 to 1000) (default -1)
-ts-parameters
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E..V....... Temporal scaling configuration using a :-separated list of key=value parameters

-auto-alt-ref
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Enable use of alternate reference frames (2-pass only) (from -1 to 6) (default -1)
-cpu-used
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Quality/Speed ratio modifier (from -8 to 8) (default 1)
-lossless
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Lossless mode (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-tile-columns
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of tile columns to use, log2 (from -1 to 6) (default -1)
-tile-rows
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of tile rows to use, log2 (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-frame-parallel
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable frame parallel decodability features (default auto)
-aq-mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... adaptive quantization mode (from -1 to 4) (default -1)
-level
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... Specify level (from -1 to 6.2) (default -1)
-row-mt
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Row based multi-threading (default auto)
-tune-content
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Tune content type (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-corpus-complexity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... corpus vbr complexity midpoint (from -1 to 10000) (default -1)

-enable-tpl
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable temporal dependency model (default auto)
-min-gf-interval
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Minimum golden/alternate reference frame interval (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-speed
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from -16 to 16) (default 1)
-quality
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default good)

-arnr_max_frames

Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction filter strength (from 0 to 6) (default 3)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... altref noise reduction filter type (from 1 to 3) (default 3)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of frames to look ahead for alternate reference frame selection (from 0 to 25) (default 25)
-sharpness
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Increase sharpness at the expense of lower PSNR (from -1 to 7) (default -1)
-lossless
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Use lossless mode (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-preset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Configuration preset (from -1 to 5) (default none)
-cr_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Conditional replenishment threshold (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-cr_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Conditional replenishment block size (from 0 to 256) (default 16)
-quality
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... Quality (from 0 to 100) (default 75)
-lossless
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Use lossless mode (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-preset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Configuration preset (from -1 to 5) (default none)
-cr_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Conditional replenishment threshold (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-cr_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Conditional replenishment block size (from 0 to 256) (default 16)
-quality
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... Quality (from 0 to 100) (default 75)
-preset
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Set the encoding preset (cf. x264 --fullhelp) (default "medium")
-tune
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Tune the encoding params (cf. x264 --fullhelp)
-profile
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Set profile restrictions (cf. x264 --fullhelp)
-fastfirstpass
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use fast settings when encoding first pass (default true)
-level
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Specify level (as defined by Annex A)
-passlogfile
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Filename for 2 pass stats
-wpredp
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Weighted prediction for P-frames
-a53cc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use A53 Closed Captions (if available) (default true)
-x264opts
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... x264 options
-crf
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... Select the quality for constant quality mode (from -1 to FLT_MAX) (default -1)
-crf_max
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... In CRF mode, prevents VBV from lowering quality beyond this point. (from -1 to FLT_MAX) (default -1)
-qp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Constant quantization parameter rate control method (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-aq-mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... AQ method (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-aq-strength
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... AQ strength. Reduces blocking and blurring in flat and textured areas. (from -1 to FLT_MAX) (default -1)
-psy
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use psychovisual optimizations. (default auto)
-psy-rd
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Strength of psychovisual optimization, in <psy-rd>:<psy-trellis> format.
-rc-lookahead
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of frames to look ahead for frametype and ratecontrol (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-weightb
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Weighted prediction for B-frames. (default auto)
-weightp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Weighted prediction analysis method. (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-ssim
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Calculate and print SSIM stats. (default auto)
-intra-refresh
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use Periodic Intra Refresh instead of IDR frames. (default auto)
-bluray-compat
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Bluray compatibility workarounds. (default auto)
-b-bias
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Influences how often B-frames are used (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default INT_MIN)
-b-pyramid
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Keep some B-frames as references. (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-mixed-refs
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... One reference per partition, as opposed to one reference per macroblock (default auto)
-8x8dct
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... High profile 8x8 transform. (default auto)
-fast-pskip
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... (default auto)
-aud
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use access unit delimiters. (default auto)
-mbtree
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use macroblock tree ratecontrol. (default auto)
-deblock
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Loop filter parameters, in <alpha:beta> form.
-cplxblur
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... Reduce fluctuations in QP (before curve compression) (from -1 to FLT_MAX) (default -1)
-partitions
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... A comma-separated list of partitions to consider. Possible values: p8x8, p4x4, b8x8, i8x8, i4x4, none, all
-direct-pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Direct MV prediction mode (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-slice-max-size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Limit the size of each slice in bytes (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-stats
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Filename for 2 pass stats
-nal-hrd
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Signal HRD information (requires vbv-bufsize; cbr not allowed in .mp4) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-avcintra-class
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... AVC-Intra class 50/100/200/300/480 (from -1 to 480) (default -1)
-me_method
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set motion estimation method (from -1 to 4) (default -1)
-motion-est
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set motion estimation method (from -1 to 4) (default -1)
-forced-idr
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames. (default false)
-coder
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Coder type (from -1 to 1) (default default)
-b_strategy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-chromaoffset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... QP difference between chroma and luma (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-sc_threshold
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Scene change threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-noise_reduction
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Noise reduction (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-udu_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use user data unregistered SEI if available (default false)
-x264-params
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E..V....... Override the x264 configuration using a :-separated list of key=value parameters

-mb_info
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Set mb_info data through AVSideData, only useful when used from the API (default false)

Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... Set the encoding preset (cf. x264 --fullhelp) (default "medium")

Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

Typ: integer
