E..V....... set the x265 qp (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-forced-idr
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... if forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames (default false)
-preset
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... set the x265 preset
-tune
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... set the x265 tune parameter
-profile
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... set the x265 profile
-udu_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use user data unregistered SEI if available (default false)
-a53cc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use A53 Closed Captions (if available) (default false)
-x265-params
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E..V....... set the x265 configuration using a :-separated list of key=value parameters

-dolbyvision
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable Dolby Vision RPU coding (default auto)
-lumi_aq
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Luminance masking AQ (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-variance_aq
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Variance AQ (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-ssim
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Show SSIM information to stdout (from 0 to 2) (default off)
-ssim_acc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... SSIM accuracy (from 0 to 4) (default 2)
-gmc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... use GMC (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-me_quality
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Motion estimation quality (from 0 to 6) (default 4)
-mpeg_quant
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263 (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-preset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding preset (from 0 to 18) (default p4)
-tune
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding tuning info (from 1 to 4) (default hq)
-level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding level restriction (from 0 to 24) (default auto)
-tier
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding tier (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-rc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Override the preset rate-control (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-multipass
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the multipass encoding (from 0 to 2) (default disabled)
-highbitdepth
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable 10 bit encode for 8 bit input (default false)
-tile-rows
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of tile rows to encode with (from -1 to 64) (default -1)
-tile-columns
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of tile columns to encode with (from -1 to 64) (default -1)
-surfaces
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of concurrent surfaces (from 0 to 64) (default 0)
-gpu
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Selects which NVENC capable GPU to use. First GPU is 0, second is 1, and so on. (from -2 to INT_MAX) (default any)
-rgb_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Configure how nvenc handles packed RGB input. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default yuv420)
-delay
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Delay frame output by the given amount of frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default INT_MAX)
-rc-lookahead
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of frames to look ahead for rate-control (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-cq
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... Set target quality level (0 to 63, 0 means automatic) for constant quality mode in VBR rate control (from 0 to 63) (default 0)
-init_qpP
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Initial QP value for P frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-init_qpB
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Initial QP value for B frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-init_qpI
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Initial QP value for I frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-qp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Constant quantization parameter rate control method (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-qp_cb_offset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Quantization parameter offset for cb channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)
-qp_cr_offset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Quantization parameter offset for cr channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)
-no-scenecut
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... When lookahead is enabled, set this to 1 to disable adaptive I-frame insertion at scene cuts (default false)
-forced-idr
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames. (default false)
-b_adapt
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... When lookahead is enabled, set this to 0 to disable adaptive B-frame decision (default true)
-spatial-aq
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... set to 1 to enable Spatial AQ (default false)
-temporal-aq
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... set to 1 to enable Temporal AQ (default false)
-zerolatency
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Set 1 to indicate zero latency operation (no reordering delay) (default false)
-nonref_p
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Set this to 1 to enable automatic insertion of non-reference P-frames (default false)
-strict_gop
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Set 1 to minimize GOP-to-GOP rate fluctuations (default false)
-aq-strength
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... When Spatial AQ is enabled, this field is used to specify AQ strength. AQ strength scale is from 1 (low) - 15 (aggressive) (from 1 to 15) (default 8)
-weighted_pred
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable weighted prediction (default false)
-b_ref_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Use B frames as references (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-dpb_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Specifies the DPB size used for encoding (0 means automatic) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-ldkfs
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Low delay key frame scale; Specifies the Scene Change frame size increase allowed in case of single frame VBV and CBR (from 0 to 255) (default 0)
-intra-refresh
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use Periodic Intra Refresh instead of IDR frames (default false)
-timing-info
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Include timing info in sequence/frame headers (default false)
-extra_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Pass on extra SEI data (e.g. a53 cc) to be included in the bitstream (default true)
-a53cc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use A53 Closed Captions (if available) (default true)
-s12m_tc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use timecode (if available) (default true)
-lookahead_level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Specifies the lookahead level. Higher level may improve quality at the expense of performance. (from -1 to 15) (default -1)
-split_encode_mode
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Specifies the split encoding mode (from 0 to 15) (default auto)

-async_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum processing parallelism (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 4)
-preset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from 0 to 7) (default 0)
-forced_idr
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Forcing I frames as IDR frames (default false)
-low_power
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... enable low power mode(experimental: many limitations by mfx version, BRC modes, etc.) (default auto)
-qsv_params
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E..V....... Set QSV encoder parameters as key1=value1:key2=value2:...

-b_strategy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-adaptive_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Adaptive I-frame placement (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-adaptive_b
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Adaptive B-frame placement (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-extbrc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Extended bitrate control (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-low_delay_brc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Allow to strictly obey avg frame size (default auto)
-max_frame_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded frame size in bytes (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-max_frame_size_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded I frame size in bytes (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-max_frame_size_p
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded P frame size in bytes (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default unknown)
-tile_cols
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of columns for tiled encoding (from 0 to 65535) (default 0)
-tile_rows
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of rows for tiled encoding (from 0 to 65535) (default 0)
-look_ahead_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Depth of look ahead in number frames, available when extbrc option is enabled (from 0 to 100) (default 0)
-usage
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding usage (from -1 to 5) (default -1)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the profile (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding level (default auto) (from -1 to 23) (default auto)
-quality
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding quality preset (from -1 to 100) (default -1)
-preset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding quality preset (from -1 to 100) (default -1)
-latency
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding latency mode (from -1 to 3) (default -1)
-rc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the rate control mode (from -1 to 6) (default -1)
-qvbr_quality_level
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Sets the QVBR quality level (from -1 to 51) (default -1)

-header_insertion_mode
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Set header insertion mode (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

-preencode
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable preencode (default auto)
-enforce_hrd
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enforce HRD (default auto)
-filler_data
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Filler Data Enable (default auto)
-high_motion_quality_boost_enable
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Enable High motion quality boost mode (default auto)

-min_qp_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... min quantization parameter for I-frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-max_qp_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... max quantization parameter for I-frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-min_qp_p
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... min quantization parameter for P-frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-max_qp_p
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... max quantization parameter for P-frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-qp_p
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... quantization parameter for P-frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-qp_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... quantization parameter for I-frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-skip_frame
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Rate Control Based Frame Skip (default auto)
-aq_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... adaptive quantization mode (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-align
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... alignment mode (from 1 to 3) (default none)
-log_to_dbg
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable AMF logging to debug output (default false)
-preanalysis
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable preanalysis (default auto)
-pa_activity_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the type of activity analysis (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-pa_scene_change_detection_enable
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Enable scene change detection (default auto)

-pa_scene_change_detection_sensitivity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Set the sensitivity of scene change detection (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

-pa_static_scene_detection_enable
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Enable static scene detection (default auto)

-pa_static_scene_detection_sensitivity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Set the sensitivity of static scene detection (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

-pa_initial_qp_after_scene_change
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... The QP value that is used immediately after a scene change (from -1 to 51) (default -1)

-pa_max_qp_before_force_skip
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... The QP threshold to allow a skip frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)

-pa_caq_strength
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Content Adaptive Quantization strength (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-pa_frame_sad_enable
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Enable Frame SAD algorithm (default auto)

-pa_ltr_enable
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable long term reference frame management (default auto)
-pa_lookahead_buffer_depth
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Sets the PA lookahead buffer size (from -1 to 41) (default -1)

-pa_paq_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Sets the perceptual adaptive quantization mode (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-pa_taq_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Sets the temporal adaptive quantization mode (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-pa_high_motion_quality_boost_mode
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Sets the PA high motion quality boost mode (from -1 to 1) (default -1)

-idr_interval
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Distance (in I-frames) between key frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-b_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum B-frame reference depth (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-async_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum processing parallelism. Increase this to improve single channel performance. (from 1 to 64) (default 2)
-low_power
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use low-power encoding mode (only available on some platforms; may not support all encoding features) (default false)
-max_frame_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum frame size (in bytes) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set rate control mode (from 0 to 6) (default auto)
-blbrc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Block level based bitrate control (default false)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set profile (seq_profile) (from -99 to 255) (default -99)
-tier
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set tier (seq_tier) (from 0 to 1) (default main)
-level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set level (seq_level_idx) (from -99 to 31) (default -99)
-tiles
Typ: string
Parameter: <image_size> E..V....... Tile columns x rows (Use minimal tile column/row number automatically by default)

-tile_groups
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of tile groups for encoding (from 1 to 4096) (default 1)
-usage
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Encoder Usage (from -1 to 5) (default -1)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Profile (from -1 to 257) (default -1)
-level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Profile Level (from 0 to 62) (default auto)
-latency
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... enables low latency mode (default auto)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding quality preset (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding quality preset (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

Typ: integer

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

-rgb_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Configure how nvenc handles packed RGB input. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default yuv420)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Delay frame output by the given amount of frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default INT_MAX)

E..V....... Set target quality level (0 to 51, 0 means automatic) for constant quality mode in VBR rate control (from 0 to 51) (default 0)

-qp_cr_offset
Typ: integer

E..V....... Quantization parameter offset for cr channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set 1 to enable weighted prediction (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-coder
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Coder type (from -1 to 2) (default default)
-b_ref_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Use B frames as references (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-a53cc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use A53 Closed Captions (if available) (default true)
-dpb_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Specifies the DPB size used for encoding (0 means automatic) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-multipass
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the multipass encoding (from 0 to 2) (default disabled)
-ldkfs
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Low delay key frame scale; Specifies the Scene Change frame size increase allowed in case of single frame VBV and CBR (from 0 to 255) (default 0)
-extra_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Pass on extra SEI data (e.g. a53 cc) to be included in the bitstream (default true)
-udu_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Pass on user data unregistered SEI if available (default false)
-intra-refresh
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use Periodic Intra Refresh instead of IDR frames (default false)
-single-slice-intra-refresh
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Use single slice intra refresh (default false)

-max_slice_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded slice size in bytes (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-constrained-encoding
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Enable constrainedFrame encoding where each slice in the constrained picture is independent of other slices (default false)

-lookahead_level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Specifies the lookahead level. Higher level may improve quality at the expense of performance. (from -1 to 15) (default -1)
-async_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum processing parallelism (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 4)
-preset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from 0 to 7) (default 0)
-forced_idr
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Forcing I frames as IDR frames (default false)
-low_power
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... enable low power mode(experimental: many limitations by mfx version, BRC modes, etc.) (default auto)
-qsv_params
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E..V....... Set QSV encoder parameters as key1=value1:key2=value2:...

-rdo
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Enable rate distortion optimization (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-max_frame_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded frame size in bytes (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-max_frame_size_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded I frame size in bytes (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-max_frame_size_p
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded P frame size in bytes (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-max_slice_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded slice size in bytes (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-bitrate_limit
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Toggle bitrate limitations (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-mbbrc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... MB level bitrate control (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-extbrc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Extended bitrate control (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-adaptive_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Adaptive I-frame placement (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-adaptive_b
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Adaptive B-frame placement (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-p_strategy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Enable P-pyramid: 0-default 1-simple 2-pyramid(bf need to be set to 0). (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-b_strategy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-dblk_idc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... This option disable deblocking. It has value in range 0~2. (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-low_delay_brc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Allow to strictly obey avg frame size (default auto)
-max_qp_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum video quantizer scale for I frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-min_qp_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Minimum video quantizer scale for I frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-max_qp_p
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum video quantizer scale for P frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-min_qp_p
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Minimum video quantizer scale for P frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-max_qp_b
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum video quantizer scale for B frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-min_qp_b
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Minimum video quantizer scale for B frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-scenario
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... A hint to encoder about the scenario for the encoding session (from 0 to 8) (default unknown)
-avbr_accuracy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Accuracy of the AVBR ratecontrol (unit of tenth of percent) (from 0 to 65535) (default 0)
-avbr_convergence
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Convergence of the AVBR ratecontrol (unit of 100 frames) (from 0 to 65535) (default 0)
-skip_frame
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Allow frame skipping (from 0 to 3) (default no_skip)
-dual_gfx
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Prefer processing on both iGfx and dGfx simultaneously (from 0 to 2) (default off)
-cavlc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable CAVLC (default false)
-vcm
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use the video conferencing mode ratecontrol (default false)
-idr_interval
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Distance (in I-frames) between IDR frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-pic_timing_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Insert picture timing SEI with pic_struct_syntax element (default true)
-single_sei_nal_unit
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Put all the SEI messages into one NALU (from -1 to 1) (default -1)

-max_dec_frame_buffering
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Maximum number of frames buffered in the DPB (from 0 to 65535) (default 0)

-look_ahead
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use VBR algorithm with look ahead (default false)
-look_ahead_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Depth of look ahead in number frames (from 0 to 100) (default 0)
-look_ahead_downsampling
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Downscaling factor for the frames saved for the lookahead analysis (from 0 to 3) (default unknown)

-int_ref_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Intra refresh type. B frames should be set to 0. (from -1 to 65535) (default -1)
-int_ref_cycle_size
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Number of frames in the intra refresh cycle (from -1 to 65535) (default -1)

-int_ref_qp_delta
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... QP difference for the refresh MBs (from -32768 to 32767) (default -32768)
-recovery_point_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Insert recovery point SEI messages (from -1 to 1) (default -1)

-int_ref_cycle_dist
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Distance between the beginnings of the intra-refresh cycles in frames (from -1 to 32767) (default -1)

-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default unknown)
-a53cc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use A53 Closed Captions (if available) (default true)
-aud
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Insert the Access Unit Delimiter NAL (default false)
-repeat_pps
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... repeat pps for every frame (default false)
-idr_interval
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Distance (in I-frames) between key frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-b_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum B-frame reference depth (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-async_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum processing parallelism. Increase this to improve single channel performance. (from 1 to 64) (default 2)
-low_power
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use low-power encoding mode (only available on some platforms; may not support all encoding features) (default false)
-max_frame_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum frame size (in bytes) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set rate control mode (from 0 to 6) (default auto)
-blbrc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Block level based bitrate control (default false)
-qp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Constant QP (for P-frames; scaled by qfactor/qoffset for I/B) (from 0 to 52) (default 0)
-quality
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set encode quality (trades off against speed, higher is faster) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-coder
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Entropy coder type (from 0 to 1) (default cabac)
-aud
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Include AUD (default false)
-sei
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... Set SEI to include (default identifier+timing+recovery_point+a53_cc)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set profile (profile_idc and constraint_set*_flag) (from -99 to 65535) (default -99)
-level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set level (level_idc) (from -99 to 255) (default -99)
-usage
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding usage (from -1 to 5) (default -1)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the profile (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-profile_tier
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the profile tier (default main) (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding level (default auto) (from 0 to 186) (default auto)
-quality
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding quality preset (from -1 to 10) (default -1)
-preset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding quality preset (from -1 to 10) (default -1)
-latency
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... enables low latency mode (default auto)
-rc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the rate control mode (from -1 to 6) (default -1)
-qvbr_quality_level
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Sets the QVBR quality level (from -1 to 51) (default -1)

-header_insertion_mode
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Set header insertion mode (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

-high_motion_quality_boost_enable
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Enable High motion quality boost mode (default auto)

-gops_per_idr
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... GOPs per IDR 0-no IDR will be inserted (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-preencode
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable preencode (default auto)
-vbaq
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable VBAQ (default auto)
-enforce_hrd

Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enforce HRD (default auto)

E..V....... Filler Data Enable (default auto)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum Access Unit Size for rate control (in bits) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... min quantization parameter for I-frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-max_qp_i

E..V....... max quantization parameter for I-frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-min_qp_p

E..V....... min quantization parameter for P-frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-max_qp_p
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... max quantization parameter for P-frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-qp_p

-qp_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... quantization parameter for I-frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-skip_frame

E..V....... Enable ME Half Pixel (default auto)

E..V....... Enable ME Quarter Pixel (default auto)
-aud
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Inserts AU Delimiter NAL unit (default auto)

Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable AMF logging to debug output (default false)
-preanalysis
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable preanalysis (default auto)
-pa_activity_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the type of activity analysis (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-pa_scene_change_detection_enable
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Enable scene change detection (default auto)

-pa_scene_change_detection_sensitivity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Set the sensitivity of scene change detection (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

-pa_static_scene_detection_enable
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Enable static scene detection (default auto)

-pa_static_scene_detection_sensitivity
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Set the sensitivity of static scene detection (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

-pa_initial_qp_after_scene_change
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... The QP value that is used immediately after a scene change (from -1 to 51) (default -1)

-pa_max_qp_before_force_skip
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... The QP threshold to allow a skip frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)

-pa_caq_strength
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Content Adaptive Quantization strength (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-pa_frame_sad_enable
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Enable Frame SAD algorithm (default auto)

-pa_ltr_enable
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable long term reference frame management (default auto)

Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Sets the PA lookahead buffer size (from -1 to 41) (default -1)

-pa_paq_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Sets the perceptual adaptive quantization mode (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-pa_taq_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Sets the temporal adaptive quantization mode (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-pa_high_motion_quality_boost_mode
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Sets the PA high motion quality boost mode (from -1 to 1) (default -1)

-idr_interval
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Distance (in I-frames) between key frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-b_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum B-frame reference depth (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-async_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum processing parallelism. Increase this to improve single channel performance. (from 1 to 64) (default 2)
-rc_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set rate control mode (from 0 to 4) (default auto)
-qp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Constant QP (for P-frames; scaled by qfactor/qoffset for I/B) (from 0 to 52) (default 0)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set profile (general_profile_idc) (from -99 to 255) (default -99)
-tier
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set tier (general_tier_flag) (from 0 to 1) (default main)
-level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set level (general_level_idc) (from -99 to 255) (default -99)
-rate_control
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Select rate control mode (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default default)
-scenario
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Select usage scenario (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default default)
-quality
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Quality (from -1 to 100) (default -1)
-hw_encoding
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Force hardware encoding (default false)
-preset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding preset (from 0 to 18) (default p4)
-tune
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding tuning info (from 1 to 5) (default hq)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding profile (from 0 to 4) (default main)
-level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding level restriction (from 0 to 186) (default auto)
-tier
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding tier (from 0 to 1) (default main)
-rc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Override the preset rate-control (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-rc-lookahead
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of frames to look ahead for rate-control (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-surfaces
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of concurrent surfaces (from 0 to 64) (default 0)
-cbr
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use cbr encoding mode (default false)
-2pass
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use 2pass encoding mode (default auto)
-gpu
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Selects which NVENC capable GPU to use. First GPU is 0, second is 1, and so on. (from -2 to INT_MAX) (default any)
-rgb_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Configure how nvenc handles packed RGB input. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default yuv420)
-delay
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Delay frame output by the given amount of frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default INT_MAX)
-no-scenecut
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... When lookahead is enabled, set this to 1 to disable adaptive I-frame insertion at scene cuts (default false)
-forced-idr
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames. (default false)
-spatial_aq
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... set to 1 to enable Spatial AQ (default false)
-spatial-aq
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... set to 1 to enable Spatial AQ (default false)
-temporal_aq
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... set to 1 to enable Temporal AQ (default false)
-temporal-aq
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... set to 1 to enable Temporal AQ (default false)
-zerolatency
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Set 1 to indicate zero latency operation (no reordering delay) (default false)
-nonref_p
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Set this to 1 to enable automatic insertion of non-reference P-frames (default false)
-strict_gop
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Set 1 to minimize GOP-to-GOP rate fluctuations (default false)
-aq-strength
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... When Spatial AQ is enabled, this field is used to specify AQ strength. AQ strength scale is from 1 (low) - 15 (aggressive) (from 1 to 15) (default 8)
-cq
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E..V....... Set target quality level (0 to 51, 0 means automatic) for constant quality mode in VBR rate control (from 0 to 51) (default 0)
-aud
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use access unit delimiters (default false)
-bluray-compat
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Bluray compatibility workarounds (default false)
-init_qpP
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Initial QP value for P frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-init_qpB
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Initial QP value for B frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-init_qpI
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Initial QP value for I frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-qp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Constant quantization parameter rate control method (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-qp_cb_offset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Quantization parameter offset for cb channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)
-qp_cr_offset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Quantization parameter offset for cr channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)
-weighted_pred
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set 1 to enable weighted prediction (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-b_ref_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Use B frames as references (from -1 to 2) (default -1)
-a53cc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use A53 Closed Captions (if available) (default true)
-s12m_tc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use timecode (if available) (default true)
-dpb_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Specifies the DPB size used for encoding (0 means automatic) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-multipass
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the multipass encoding (from 0 to 2) (default disabled)
-highbitdepth
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable 10 bit encode for 8 bit input (default false)
-ldkfs
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Low delay key frame scale; Specifies the Scene Change frame size increase allowed in case of single frame VBV and CBR (from 0 to 255) (default 0)
-extra_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Pass on extra SEI data (e.g. a53 cc) to be included in the bitstream (default true)
-udu_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Pass on user data unregistered SEI if available (default false)
-intra-refresh
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use Periodic Intra Refresh instead of IDR frames (default false)
-single-slice-intra-refresh
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Use single slice intra refresh (default false)

-max_slice_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded slice size in bytes (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-constrained-encoding
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Enable constrainedFrame encoding where each slice in the constrained picture is independent of other slices (default false)

-tf_level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Specifies the strength of the temporal filtering (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-lookahead_level
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Specifies the lookahead level. Higher level may improve quality at the expense of performance. (from -1 to 15) (default -1)
-unidir_b
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Enable use of unidirectional B-Frames. (default false)
-split_encode_mode
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Specifies the split encoding mode (from 0 to 15) (default auto)

-async_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum processing parallelism (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 4)
-preset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from 0 to 7) (default 0)
-forced_idr
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Forcing I frames as IDR frames (default false)
-low_power
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... enable low power mode(experimental: many limitations by mfx version, BRC modes, etc.) (default auto)
-qsv_params
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E..V....... Set QSV encoder parameters as key1=value1:key2=value2:...

-rdo
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Enable rate distortion optimization (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-max_frame_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded frame size in bytes (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum encoded I frame size in bytes (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

Parameter: <int>

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... MB level bitrate control (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-extbrc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Extended bitrate control (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-p_strategy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Enable P-pyramid: 0-default 1-simple 2-pyramid(bf need to be set to 0). (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-b_strategy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-dblk_idc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... This option disable deblocking. It has value in range 0~2. (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-low_delay_brc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Allow to strictly obey avg frame size (default auto)
-max_qp_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum video quantizer scale for I frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-min_qp_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Minimum video quantizer scale for I frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-max_qp_p
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum video quantizer scale for P frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-min_qp_p
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Minimum video quantizer scale for P frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-max_qp_b
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum video quantizer scale for B frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-min_qp_b
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Minimum video quantizer scale for B frame (from -1 to 51) (default -1)
-adaptive_i
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Adaptive I-frame placement (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-adaptive_b
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Adaptive B-frame placement (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-scenario
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... A hint to encoder about the scenario for the encoding session (from 0 to 8) (default unknown)
-avbr_accuracy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Accuracy of the AVBR ratecontrol (unit of tenth of percent) (from 0 to 65535) (default 0)
-avbr_convergence
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Convergence of the AVBR ratecontrol (unit of 100 frames) (from 0 to 65535) (default 0)
-skip_frame
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Allow frame skipping (from 0 to 3) (default no_skip)
-dual_gfx
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Prefer processing on both iGfx and dGfx simultaneously (from 0 to 2) (default off)
-idr_interval
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Distance (in I-frames) between IDR frames (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-load_plugin
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... A user plugin to load in an internal session (from 0 to 2) (default hevc_hw)
-load_plugins
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..V....... A :-separate list of hexadecimal plugin UIDs to load in an internal session (default "")
-look_ahead_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Depth of look ahead in number frames, available when extbrc option is enabled (from 0 to 100) (default 0)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default unknown)
-tier
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set the encoding tier (only level >= 4 can support high tier) (from 0 to 256) (default high)
-gpb
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... 1: GPB (generalized P/B frame); 0: regular P frame (default true)
-tile_cols
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of columns for tiled encoding (from 0 to 65535) (default 0)
-tile_rows
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Number of rows for tiled encoding (from 0 to 65535) (default 0)
-recovery_point_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Insert recovery point SEI messages (from -1 to 1) (default -1)

-aud
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Insert the Access Unit Delimiter NAL (default false)
-pic_timing_sei
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Insert picture timing SEI with pic_struct_syntax element (default true)
-transform_skip
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Turn this option ON to enable transformskip (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-int_ref_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Intra refresh type. B frames should be set to 0 (from -1 to 65535) (default -1)
-int_ref_cycle_size
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Number of frames in the intra refresh cycle (from -1 to 65535) (default -1)

-int_ref_qp_delta
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... QP difference for the refresh MBs (from -32768 to 32767) (default -32768)
-int_ref_cycle_dist
Typ: string
Parameter: E..V....... Distance between the beginnings of the intra-refresh cycles in frames (from -1 to 32767) (default -1)

-idr_interval
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Distance (in I-frames) between key frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-b_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum B-frame reference depth (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-async_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum processing parallelism. Increase this to improve single channel performance. (from 1 to 64) (default 2)
-low_power
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Use low-power encoding mode (only available on some platforms; may not support all encoding features) (default false)
-max_frame_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Maximum frame size (in bytes) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-rc_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set rate control mode (from 0 to 6) (default auto)
-blbrc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Block level based bitrate control (default false)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Constant QP (for P-frames; scaled by qfactor/qoffset for I/B) (from 0 to 52) (default 0)

Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... Include AUD (default false)
-profile
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... Set profile (general_profile_idc) (from -99 to 255) (default -99)

Typ: integer

E..V....... Set tier (general_tier_flag) (from 0 to 1) (default main)

Parameter: <int>

-drop_second_field
Typ: string
Parameter: .D.V....... Drop second field when deinterlacing (default false)

-crop
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D.V....... Crop (top)x(bottom)x(left)x(right)
-resize
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D.V....... Resize (width)x(height)
-deint
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... Set deinterlacing mode (from 0 to 2) (default weave)
-gpu
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D.V....... GPU to be used for decoding
-surfaces
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V......P Maximum surfaces to be used for decoding (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-drop_second_field
Typ: string
Parameter: .D.V....... Drop second field when deinterlacing (default false)

-crop
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D.V....... Crop (top)x(bottom)x(left)x(right)
-resize

Parameter: <string>

.D.V....... Resize (width)x(height)

.D.V....... Set deinterlacing mode (from 0 to 2) (default weave)

.D.V....... GPU to be used for decoding

.D.V......P Maximum surfaces to be used for decoding (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

Parameter: .D.V....... Drop second field when deinterlacing (default false)

.D.V....... Crop (top)x(bottom)x(left)x(right)
-resize
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D.V....... Resize (width)x(height)
-async_depth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... Internal parallelization depth, the higher the value the higher the latency. (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 4)
-gpu_copy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... A GPU-accelerated copy between video and system memory (from 0 to 2) (default default)

Typ: integer

.D.V....... Set deinterlacing mode (from 0 to 2) (default weave)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... Internal parallelization depth, the higher the value the higher the latency. (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 4)
-gpu_copy
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D.V....... A GPU-accelerated copy between video and system memory (from 0 to 2) (default default)
-avioflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

ED......... (default 0)
-probesize
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

.D......... set probing size (from 32 to I64_MAX) (default 5000000)
-formatprobesize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... number of bytes to probe file format (from 0 to 2.14748e+09) (default 1048576)
-packetsize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set packet size (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-fflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

ED......... (default autobsf)
-seek2any
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... allow seeking to non-keyframes on demuxer level when supported (default false)
-analyzeduration
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

.D......... specify how many microseconds are analyzed to probe the input (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-cryptokey
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

.D......... decryption key
-indexmem
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... max memory used for timestamp index (per stream) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1048576)
-rtbufsize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... max memory used for buffering real-time frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 3041280)
-fdebug
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

ED......... print specific debug info (default 0)
-max_delay
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... maximum muxing or demuxing delay in microseconds (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-start_time_realtime
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... wall-clock time when stream begins (PTS==0) (from I64_MIN to I64_MAX) (default I64_MIN)

-fpsprobesize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... number of frames used to probe fps (from -1 to 2.14748e+09) (default -1)
-audio_preload
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... microseconds by which audio packets should be interleaved earlier (from 0 to 2.14748e+09) (default 0)
-chunk_duration
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... microseconds for each chunk (from 0 to 2.14748e+09) (default 0)
-chunk_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... size in bytes for each chunk (from 0 to 2.14748e+09) (default 0)
-f_err_detect
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

.D......... set error detection flags (deprecated; use err_detect, save via avconv) (default crccheck)
-err_detect
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

.D......... set error detection flags (default crccheck)
-use_wallclock_as_timestamps
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... use wallclock as timestamps (default false)

-skip_initial_bytes
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... set number of bytes to skip before reading header and frames (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)

-correct_ts_overflow
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... correct single timestamp overflows (default true)

-flush_packets
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... enable flushing of the I/O context after each packet (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-metadata_header_padding
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set number of bytes to be written as padding in a metadata header (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-output_ts_offset
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set output timestamp offset (default 0)
-max_interleave_delta
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... maximum buffering duration for interleaving (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 10000000)

-f_strict
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... how strictly to follow the standards (deprecated; use strict, save via avconv) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default normal)
-strict
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... how strictly to follow the standards (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default normal)
-max_ts_probe
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... maximum number of packets to read while waiting for the first timestamp (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 50)
-avoid_negative_ts
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... shift timestamps so they start at 0 (from -1 to 2) (default auto)

-dump_separator
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... set information dump field separator (default ", ")
-codec_whitelist
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... List of decoders that are allowed to be used
-format_whitelist
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... List of demuxers that are allowed to be used
-protocol_whitelist
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... List of protocols that are allowed to be used

-protocol_blacklist
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... List of protocols that are not allowed to be used

-max_streams
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... maximum number of streams (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1000)
-skip_estimate_duration_from_pts
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... skip duration calculation in estimate_timings_from_pts (default false)

-max_probe_packets
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... Maximum number of packets to probe a codec (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 2500)

-duration_probesize
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... Maximum number of bytes to probe the durations of the streams in estimate_timings_from_pts (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)

-protocol_whitelist
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... List of protocols that are allowed to be used

-protocol_whitelist
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... List of protocols that are allowed to be used

-protocol_blacklist
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... List of protocols that are not allowed to be used

-rw_timeout
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... Timeout for IO operations (in microseconds) (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-read_ahead_limit
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Amount in bytes that may be read ahead when seeking isn't supported, -1 for unlimited (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default 65536)
-key
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

ED......... AES encryption/decryption key
-iv
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

ED......... AES encryption/decryption initialization vector
-decryption_key
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

.D......... AES decryption key
-decryption_iv
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

.D......... AES decryption initialization vector

Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

E.......... AES encryption key
-encryption_iv
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

E.......... AES encryption initialization vector
-blocksize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set I/O operation maximum block size (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default INT_MAX)
-fd
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set file descriptor (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-ffrtmpcrypt_tunneling
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... Use a HTTP tunneling connection (RTMPTE). (from 0 to 1) (default 0)

-ffrtmphttp_tls
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... Use a HTTPS tunneling connection (RTMPTS). (default false)
-truncate
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... truncate existing files on write (default true)
-blocksize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set I/O operation maximum block size (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default INT_MAX)
-follow
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Follow a file as it is being written (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-seekable
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Sets if the file is seekable (from -1 to 0) (default -1)
-timeout
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... set timeout of socket I/O operations (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-ftp-write-seekable
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... control seekability of connection during encoding (default false)

-ftp-anonymous-password
Typ: string
Parameter: ED......... password for anonymous login. E-mail address should be used.

-ftp-user
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... user for FTP login. Overridden by whatever is in the URL.
-ftp-password
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... password for FTP login. Overridden by whatever is in the URL.
-seekable
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... control seekability of connection (default auto)
-chunked_post
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... use chunked transfer-encoding for posts (default true)
-http_proxy
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... set HTTP proxy to tunnel through
-headers
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... set custom HTTP headers, can override built in default headers
-content_type
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... set a specific content type for the POST messages
-user_agent
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... override User-Agent header (default "Lavf/61.7.100")
-referer
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... override referer header
-multiple_requests
Typ: string
Parameter: ED......... use persistent connections (default false)

-post_data
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

ED......... set custom HTTP post data
-cookies
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... set cookies to be sent in applicable future requests, use newline delimited Set-Cookie HTTP field value syntax
-icy
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... request ICY metadata (default true)
-auth_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... HTTP authentication type (from 0 to 1) (default none)
-send_expect_100
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Force sending an Expect: 100-continue header for POST (default auto)
-location
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... The actual location of the data received
-offset
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

.D......... initial byte offset (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-end_offset
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

.D......... try to limit the request to bytes preceding this offset (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-method
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Override the HTTP method or set the expected HTTP method from a client
-reconnect
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... auto reconnect after disconnect before EOF (default false)
-reconnect_at_eof
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... auto reconnect at EOF (default false)
-reconnect_on_network_error
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... auto reconnect in case of tcp/tls error during connect (default false)

-reconnect_on_http_error
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... list of http status codes to reconnect on

-reconnect_streamed
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... auto reconnect streamed / non seekable streams (default false)

-reconnect_delay_max
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... max reconnect delay in seconds after which to give up (from 0 to 4294) (default 120)

-reconnect_max_retries
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... the max number of times to retry a connection (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-reconnect_delay_total_max
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... max total reconnect delay in seconds after which to give up (from 0 to 4294) (default 256)

-respect_retry_after
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... respect the Retry-After header when retrying connections (default true)

-listen
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... listen on HTTP (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-resource
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... The resource requested by a client
-reply_code
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... The http status code to return to a client (from INT_MIN to 599) (default 200)
-short_seek_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Threshold to favor readahead over seek. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-seekable
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... control seekability of connection (default auto)
-chunked_post
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... use chunked transfer-encoding for posts (default true)

Parameter: <string>

ED......... set HTTP proxy to tunnel through

-reconnect_on_http_error
Typ: string

-reconnect_streamed
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... auto reconnect streamed / non seekable streams (default false)

-reconnect_delay_max
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... max reconnect delay in seconds after which to give up (from 0 to 4294) (default 120)

-reconnect_max_retries

Parameter: .D......... the max number of times to retry a connection (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-reconnect_delay_total_max
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... max total reconnect delay in seconds after which to give up (from 0 to 4294) (default 256)

-respect_retry_after
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... respect the Retry-After header when retrying connections (default true)

-listen
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... listen on HTTP (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-resource
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... The resource requested by a client
-reply_code
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... The http status code to return to a client (from INT_MIN to 599) (default 200)
-short_seek_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Threshold to favor readahead over seek. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-ice_genre
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set stream genre
-ice_name
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set stream description
-ice_description
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set stream description
-ice_url
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set stream website
-ice_public
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... set if stream is public (default false)
-user_agent
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... override User-Agent header
-password
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set password
-content_type
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set content-type, MUST be set if not audio/mpeg
-legacy_icecast
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... use legacy SOURCE method, for Icecast < v2.4 (default false)
-tls
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... use a TLS connection (default false)
-blocksize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set I/O operation maximum block size (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default INT_MAX)
-fd
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set file descriptor (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-ttl
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Time to live (in milliseconds, multicast only) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-l
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... FEC L (from 4 to 20) (default 5)
-d
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... FEC D (from 4 to 20) (default 5)
-rtmp_app
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Name of application to connect to on the RTMP server
-rtmp_buffer
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Set buffer time in milliseconds. The default is 3000. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 3000)
-rtmp_conn
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Append arbitrary AMF data to the Connect message
-rtmp_flashver
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Version of the Flash plugin used to run the SWF player.
-rtmp_flush_interval
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Number of packets flushed in the same request (RTMPT only). (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 10)

-rtmp_enhanced_codecs
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Specify the codec(s) to use in an enhanced rtmp live stream

-rtmp_live
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Specify that the media is a live stream. (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default any)
-rtmp_pageurl
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... URL of the web page in which the media was embedded. By default no value will be sent.
-rtmp_playpath
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Stream identifier to play or to publish
-rtmp_subscribe
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... Name of live stream to subscribe to. Defaults to rtmp_playpath.
-rtmp_swfhash
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

.D......... SHA256 hash of the decompressed SWF file (32 bytes).
-rtmp_swfsize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Size of the decompressed SWF file, required for SWFVerification. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-rtmp_swfurl
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... URL of the SWF player. By default no value will be sent
-rtmp_swfverify
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... URL to player swf file, compute hash/size automatically.
-rtmp_tcurl
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... URL of the target stream. Defaults to proto://host[:port]/app.
-rtmp_listen
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Listen for incoming rtmp connections (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-listen
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Listen for incoming rtmp connections (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-tcp_nodelay
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Use TCP_NODELAY to disable Nagle's algorithm (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-timeout
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Maximum timeout (in seconds) to wait for incoming connections. -1 is infinite. Implies -rtmp_listen 1 (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-rtmp_app
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Name of application to connect to on the RTMP server
-rtmp_buffer
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Set buffer time in milliseconds. The default is 3000. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 3000)
-rtmp_conn
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Append arbitrary AMF data to the Connect message
-rtmp_flashver
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Version of the Flash plugin used to run the SWF player.
-rtmp_flush_interval
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Number of packets flushed in the same request (RTMPT only). (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 10)

-rtmp_enhanced_codecs
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Specify the codec(s) to use in an enhanced rtmp live stream

-rtmp_live
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Specify that the media is a live stream. (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default any)
-rtmp_pageurl
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... URL of the web page in which the media was embedded. By default no value will be sent.
-rtmp_playpath
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Stream identifier to play or to publish
-rtmp_subscribe
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... Name of live stream to subscribe to. Defaults to rtmp_playpath.
-rtmp_swfhash
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

.D......... SHA256 hash of the decompressed SWF file (32 bytes).
-rtmp_swfsize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Size of the decompressed SWF file, required for SWFVerification. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-rtmp_swfurl
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... URL of the SWF player. By default no value will be sent
-rtmp_swfverify
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... URL to player swf file, compute hash/size automatically.
-rtmp_tcurl
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... URL of the target stream. Defaults to proto://host[:port]/app.
-rtmp_listen
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Listen for incoming rtmp connections (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-listen
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Listen for incoming rtmp connections (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-tcp_nodelay
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Use TCP_NODELAY to disable Nagle's algorithm (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-timeout
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Maximum timeout (in seconds) to wait for incoming connections. -1 is infinite. Implies -rtmp_listen 1 (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-ttl
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Time to live (multicast only) (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-buffer_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Send/Receive buffer size (in bytes) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-rtcp_port
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Custom rtcp port (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Local rtp port (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-local_rtcpport
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Local rtcp port (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-connect
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... Connect socket (default false)
-write_to_source
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... Send packets to the source address of the latest received packet (default false)
-pkt_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Maximum packet size (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-dscp
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... DSCP class (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-timeout
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... set timeout (in microseconds) of socket I/O operations (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
-sources
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Source list

Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Block list
-fec
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... FEC

Typ: string

ED......... Local address

Parameter: <string>

E..........
-srtp_out_params
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E..........
-srtp_in_suite
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D.........
-srtp_in_params
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D.........
-start
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

.D......... start offset (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-end
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

.D......... end offset (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
