Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Listen for incoming connections (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-local_port
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Local port
-local_addr
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Local address
-timeout
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... set timeout (in microseconds) of socket I/O operations (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-listen_timeout
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Connection awaiting timeout (in milliseconds) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-send_buffer_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Socket send buffer size (in bytes) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-recv_buffer_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Socket receive buffer size (in bytes) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-tcp_nodelay
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... Use TCP_NODELAY to disable nagle's algorithm (default false)
-ca_file
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Certificate Authority database file
-cafile
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Certificate Authority database file
-tls_verify
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Verify the peer certificate (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-cert_file
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Certificate file
-key_file
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Private key file
-listen
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Listen for incoming connections (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-verifyhost
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Verify against a specific hostname
-http_proxy
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Set proxy to tunnel through
-buffer_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... System data size (in bytes) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-bitrate
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E.......... Bits to send per second (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-burst_bits
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E.......... Max length of bursts in bits (when using bitrate) (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-localport
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Local port (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-local_port
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Local port (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-localaddr
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Local address
-udplite_coverage
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... choose UDPLite head size which should be validated by checksum (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-pkt_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Maximum UDP packet size (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default 1472)
-reuse
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... explicitly allow reusing UDP sockets (default auto)
-reuse_socket
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... explicitly allow reusing UDP sockets (default auto)
-broadcast
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... explicitly allow or disallow broadcast destination (default false)
-ttl
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Time to live (multicast only) (from 0 to 255) (default 16)
-connect
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... set if connect() should be called on socket (default false)
-fifo_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set the UDP receiving circular buffer size, expressed as a number of packets with size of 188 bytes (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 28672)
-overrun_nonfatal
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... survive in case of UDP receiving circular buffer overrun (default false)
-timeout
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set raise error timeout, in microseconds (only in read mode) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-sources
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Source list
-block
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Block list
-buffer_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... System data size (in bytes) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-bitrate
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E.......... Bits to send per second (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-burst_bits
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E.......... Max length of bursts in bits (when using bitrate) (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-localport
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Local port (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-local_port
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Local port (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-localaddr
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Local address
-udplite_coverage
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... choose UDPLite head size which should be validated by checksum (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-pkt_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Maximum UDP packet size (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default 1472)
-reuse
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... explicitly allow reusing UDP sockets (default auto)
-reuse_socket
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... explicitly allow reusing UDP sockets (default auto)
-broadcast
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... explicitly allow or disallow broadcast destination (default false)
-ttl
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Time to live (multicast only) (from 0 to 255) (default 16)
-connect
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... set if connect() should be called on socket (default false)
-fifo_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set the UDP receiving circular buffer size, expressed as a number of packets with size of 188 bytes (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 28672)
-overrun_nonfatal
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... survive in case of UDP receiving circular buffer overrun (default false)
-timeout
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set raise error timeout, in microseconds (only in read mode) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-sources
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Source list
-block
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Block list
-timeout
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... Timeout of socket I/O operations (in microseconds) (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
-listen_timeout
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... Connection awaiting timeout (in microseconds) (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
-send_buffer_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Socket send buffer size (in bytes) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-recv_buffer_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Socket receive buffer size (in bytes) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-pkt_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Maximum SRT packet size (from -1 to 1456) (default -1)
-payload_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Maximum SRT packet size (from -1 to 1456) (default -1)
-maxbw
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... Maximum bandwidth (bytes per second) that the connection can use (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
-pbkeylen
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Crypto key len in bytes {16,24,32} Default: 16 (128-bit) (from -1 to 32) (default -1)
-passphrase
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... Crypto PBKDF2 Passphrase size[0,10..64] 0:disable crypto
-enforced_encryption
Typ: string
Parameter: ED......... Enforces that both connection parties have the same passphrase set (default auto)

-kmrefreshrate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... The number of packets to be transmitted after which the encryption key is switched to a new key (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-kmpreannounce
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... The interval between when a new encryption key is sent and when switchover occurs (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-snddropdelay
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... The sender's extra delay(in microseconds) before dropping packets (from -2 to I64_MAX) (default -2)
-mss
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... The Maximum Segment Size (from -1 to 1500) (default -1)
-ffs
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Flight flag size (window size) (in bytes) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-ipttl
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... IP Time To Live (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-iptos
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... IP Type of Service (from -1 to 255) (default -1)
-inputbw
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... Estimated input stream rate (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
-oheadbw
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... MaxBW ceiling based on % over input stream rate (from -1 to 100) (default -1)
-latency
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... receiver delay (in microseconds) to absorb bursts of missed packet retransmissions (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
-tsbpddelay
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... deprecated, same effect as latency option (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
-rcvlatency
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... receive latency (in microseconds) (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
-peerlatency
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... peer latency (in microseconds) (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
-tlpktdrop
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... Enable too-late pkt drop (default auto)
-nakreport
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... Enable receiver to send periodic NAK reports (default auto)
-connect_timeout
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

ED......... Connect timeout(in milliseconds). Caller default: 3000, rendezvous (x 10) (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
-mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Connection mode (caller, listener, rendezvous) (from 0 to 2) (default caller)
-sndbuf
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Send buffer size (in bytes) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-rcvbuf
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Receive buffer size (in bytes) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-lossmaxttl
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Maximum possible packet reorder tolerance (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-minversion
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... The minimum SRT version that is required from the peer (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-streamid
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... A string of up to 512 characters that an Initiator can pass to a Responder
-srt_streamid
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... A string of up to 512 characters that an Initiator can pass to a Responder
-smoother
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... The type of Smoother used for the transmission for that socket
-messageapi
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... Enable message API (default auto)
-transtype
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... The transmission type for the socket (from 0 to 2) (default 2)
-linger
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Number of seconds that the socket waits for unsent data when closing (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-tsbpd
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

ED......... Timestamp-based packet delivery (default auto)
-timeout
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... set timeout of socket I/O operations (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-truncate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Truncate existing files on write (from 0 to 1) (default 1)
-private_key
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

ED......... set path to private key
-pkt_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Maximum send/read packet size (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default 131072)
-gateway
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... The gateway to ask for IPFS data.
-gateway
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... The gateway to ask for IPFS data.
-write_crc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... enable checksum (default false)
-write_id3v2
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Enable ID3v2 tag writing (default false)
-write_apetag
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Enable APE tag writing (default false)
-write_mpeg2
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Set MPEG version to MPEG-2 (default false)
-write_id3v2
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Enable ID3 tags writing. (default false)
-id3v2_version
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Select ID3v2 version to write. Currently 3 and 4 are supported. (from 3 to 4) (default 4)
-type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E...A...... set file type (from 0 to 2) (default auto)
-plays
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Number of times to play the output: 0 - infinite loop, 1 - no loop (from 0 to 65535) (default 1)
-final_delay
Typ: string
Parameter: <rational>

E.......... Force delay after the last frame (from 0 to 65535) (default 0/1)
-version_major
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... override file major version (from 0 to 65535) (default 2)
-version_minor
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... override file minor version (from 0 to 65535) (default 1)
-name
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... embedded file name (max 8 characters)
-skip_rate_check
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... skip sample rate check (default false)
-loop
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... set loop flag (default false)
-reverb
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... set reverb flag (default true)
-packet_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Packet size (from 100 to 65536) (default 3200)
-ignore_readorder
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... write events immediately, even if they're out-of-order (default false)
-loopstart
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E.......... Loopstart position in milliseconds. (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-loopend
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E.......... Loopend position in milliseconds. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-packet_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Packet size (from 100 to 65536) (default 3200)
-reserve_index_space
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... reserve space (in bytes) at the beginning of the file for each stream index (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-write_channel_mask
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... write channel mask into wave format header (default true)

-flipped_raw_rgb
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Raw RGB bitmaps are stored bottom-up (default false)
-movie_timescale
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set movie timescale (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1000)
-loop
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Number of times to loop animated AVIF: 0 - infinite loop (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-adaptation_sets
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... Adaptation sets. Syntax: id=0,streams=0,1,2 id=1,streams=3,4 and so on
-dash_segment_type
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set dash segment files type (from 0 to 2) (default auto)

-extra_window_size
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... number of segments kept outside of the manifest before removing from disk (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 5)

-format_options
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E.......... set list of options for the container format (mp4/webm) used for dash

-frag_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... fragment duration (in seconds, fractional value can be set) (default 0)
-frag_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set type of interval for fragments (from 0 to 3) (default none)
-global_sidx
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Write global SIDX atom. Applicable only for single file, mp4 output, non-streaming mode (default false)
-hls_master_name
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... HLS master playlist name (default "master.m3u8")
-hls_playlist
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Generate HLS playlist files(master.m3u8, media_%d.m3u8) (default false)
-http_opts
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E.......... HTTP protocol options

-http_persistent
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Use persistent HTTP connections (default false)
-http_user_agent
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... override User-Agent field in HTTP header
-ignore_io_errors
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Ignore IO errors during open and write. Useful for long-duration runs with network output (default false)
-index_correction
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Enable/Disable segment index correction logic (default false)
-init_seg_name
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... DASH-templated name to used for the initialization segment (default "init-stream$RepresentationID$.$ext$")
-ldash
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Enable Low-latency dash. Constrains the value of a few elements (default false)
-lhls
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Enable Low-latency HLS(Experimental). Adds #EXT-X-PREFETCH tag with current segment's URI (default false)
-master_m3u8_publish_rate
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Publish master playlist every after this many segment intervals (from 0 to UINT32_MAX) (default 0)

-max_playback_rate
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Set desired maximum playback rate (from 0.5 to 1.5) (default 1/1)

-media_seg_name
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... DASH-templated name to used for the media segments (default "chunk-stream$RepresentationID$-$Number%05d$.$ext$")
-method
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set the HTTP method
-min_playback_rate
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Set desired minimum playback rate (from 0.5 to 1.5) (default 1/1)

-mpd_profile
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... Set profiles. Elements and values used in the manifest may be constrained by them (default dash)
-remove_at_exit
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... remove all segments when finished (default false)
-seg_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... segment duration (in seconds, fractional value can be set) (default 5)
-single_file
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Store all segments in one file, accessed using byte ranges (default false)
-single_file_name
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... DASH-templated name to be used for baseURL. Implies storing all segments in one file, accessed using byte ranges
-streaming
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Enable/Disable streaming mode of output. Each frame will be moof fragment (default false)
-target_latency
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... Set desired target latency for Low-latency dash (default 0)
-timeout
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set timeout for socket I/O operations (default -0.000001)
-update_period
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E.......... Set the mpd update interval (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-use_template
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Use SegmentTemplate instead of SegmentList (default true)
-use_timeline
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Use SegmentTimeline in SegmentTemplate (default true)
-utc_timing_url
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... URL of the page that will return the UTC timestamp in ISO format
-window_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... number of segments kept in the manifest (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-write_prft
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Write producer reference time element (default auto)
-brand
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... Override major brand
-empty_hdlr_name
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... write zero-length name string in hdlr atoms within mdia and minf atoms (default false)
-encryption_key
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

E.......... The media encryption key (hex)
-encryption_kid
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

E.......... The media encryption key identifier (hex)
-encryption_scheme
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Configures the encryption scheme, allowed values are none, cenc-aes-ctr

-frag_duration
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Maximum fragment duration (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-frag_interleave
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Interleave samples within fragments (max number of consecutive samples, lower is tighter interleaving, but with more overhead) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-frag_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Maximum fragment size (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-fragment_index
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Fragment number of the next fragment (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-iods_audio_profile
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... iods audio profile atom. (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

-iods_video_profile
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... iods video profile atom. (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

-ism_lookahead
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Number of lookahead entries for ISM files (from 0 to 255) (default 0)
-movflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... MOV muxer flags (default 0)
-moov_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... maximum moov size so it can be placed at the begin (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-min_frag_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Minimum fragment duration (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-mov_gamma
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E.......... gamma value for gama atom (from 0 to 10) (default 0)
-movie_timescale
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set movie timescale (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1000)
-rtpflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... RTP muxer flags (default 0)
-skip_iods
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Skip writing iods atom. (default true)
-use_editlist
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... use edit list (default auto)
-use_stream_ids_as_track_ids
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... use stream ids as track ids (default false)

-video_track_timescale
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set timescale of all video tracks (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-write_btrt
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... force or disable writing btrt (default auto)
-write_prft
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Write producer reference time box with specified time source (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-write_tmcd
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... force or disable writing tmcd (default auto)
-attempt_recovery
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Attempt recovery in case of failure (default false)
-drop_pkts_on_overflow
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Drop packets on fifo queue overflow not to block encoder (default false)

-fifo_format
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... Target muxer
-format_opts
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E.......... Options to be passed to underlying muxer

-max_recovery_attempts
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Maximal number of recovery attempts (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-queue_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Size of fifo queue (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 60)
-recovery_wait_streamtime
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Use stream time instead of real time while waiting for recovery (default false)

-recovery_wait_time
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Waiting time between recovery attempts (default 5)

-recover_any_error
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Attempt recovery regardless of type of the error (default false)

-restart_with_keyframe
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Wait for keyframe when restarting output (default false)

-timeshift
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... Delay fifo output (default 0)
-write_header
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Write the file header (default true)
-flvflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... FLV muxer flags (default 0)
-hash
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set hash to use (default "sha256")
-format_version
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... file format version (from 1 to 2) (default 2)
-hash
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set hash to use (default "md5")
-format_version
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... file format version (from 1 to 2) (default 2)
-loop
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Number of times to loop the output: -1 - no loop, 0 - infinite loop (from -1 to 65535) (default 0)
-final_delay
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Force delay (in centiseconds) after the last frame (from -1 to 65535) (default -1)
-hash
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set hash to use (default "sha256")
-window_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... number of fragments kept in the manifest (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-extra_window_size
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... number of fragments kept outside of the manifest before removing from disk (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 5)

-min_frag_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... minimum fragment duration (in microseconds) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 10000000)

-remove_at_exit
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... remove all fragments when finished (default false)
-start_number
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E.......... set first number in the sequence (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-hls_time
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set segment length (default 2)
-hls_init_time
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set segment length at init list (default 0)
-hls_list_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set maximum number of playlist entries (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 5)
-hls_delete_threshold
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set number of unreferenced segments to keep before deleting (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)

-hls_vtt_options
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set hls vtt list of options for the container format used for hls
-hls_allow_cache
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... explicitly set whether the client MAY (1) or MUST NOT (0) cache media segments (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-hls_base_url
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... url to prepend to each playlist entry
-hls_segment_filename
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... filename template for segment files

-hls_segment_options
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary>

E.......... set segments files format options of hls
-hls_segment_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... maximum size per segment file, (in bytes) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-hls_key_info_file
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... file with key URI and key file path

-hls_enc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... enable AES128 encryption support (default false)
-hls_enc_key
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... hex-coded 16 byte key to encrypt the segments
-hls_enc_key_url
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... url to access the key to decrypt the segments
-hls_enc_iv
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... hex-coded 16 byte initialization vector
-hls_subtitle_path
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set path of hls subtitles

-hls_segment_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set hls segment files type (from 0 to 1) (default mpegts)
-hls_fmp4_init_filename
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set fragment mp4 file init filename (default "init.mp4")

-hls_fmp4_init_resend
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... resend fragment mp4 init file after refresh m3u8 every time (default false)

-hls_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... set flags affecting HLS playlist and media file generation (default 0)
-strftime
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... set filename expansion with strftime at segment creation (default false)
-strftime_mkdir
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... create last directory component in strftime-generated filename (default false)
-hls_playlist_type
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set the HLS playlist type (from 0 to 2) (default 0)

-method
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set the HTTP method(default: PUT)
-hls_start_number_source
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set source of first number in sequence (from 0 to 3) (default generic)

-http_user_agent
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... override User-Agent field in HTTP header
-var_stream_map
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... Variant stream map string
-cc_stream_map
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... Closed captions stream map string

Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... Create HLS master playlist with this name
-master_pl_publish_rate
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Publish master play list every after this many segment intervals (from 0 to UINT32_MAX) (default 0)

-http_persistent
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Use persistent HTTP connections (default false)
-timeout
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set timeout for socket I/O operations (default -0.000001)
-ignore_io_errors
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Ignore IO errors for stable long-duration runs with network output (default false)
-headers
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set custom HTTP headers, can override built in default headers
-update
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... continuously overwrite one file (default false)
-start_number
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set first number in the sequence (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-strftime
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... use strftime for filename (default false)
-frame_pts
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... use current frame pts for filename (default false)

Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... write files atomically (using temporary files and renames) (default false)

Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E.......... specify protocol options for the opened files

Parameter: <string>

Parameter: E.......... set timescale of all video tracks (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-write_btrt
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... force or disable writing btrt (default auto)
-write_prft
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Write producer reference time box with specified time source (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
-write_tmcd
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... force or disable writing tmcd (default auto)
-smc-interval
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... StreamMuxConfig interval. (from 1 to 65535) (default 20)
-hash
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set hash to use (default "md5")
-reserve_index_space
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... reserve a given amount of space (in bytes) at the beginning of the file for the index (cues) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-cues_to_front
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... move Cues (the index) to the front by shifting data if necessary (default false)
-cluster_size_limit
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... store at most the provided amount of bytes in a cluster (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-cluster_time_limit
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... store at most the provided number of milliseconds in a cluster (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)

-dash
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... create a WebM file conforming to WebM DASH specification (default false)
-dash_track_number
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... track number for the DASH stream (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)

-live
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... write files assuming it is a live stream (default false)
-allow_raw_vfw
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... allow raw VFW mode (default false)
-flipped_raw_rgb
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... store raw RGB bitmaps in VFW mode in bottom-up mode (default false)
-write_crc32
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... write a CRC32 element inside every Level 1 element (default true)
-default_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... control how a track's FlagDefault is inferred (from 0 to 2) (default passthrough)
-reserve_index_space
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... reserve a given amount of space (in bytes) at the beginning of the file for the index (cues) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-cues_to_front
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... move Cues (the index) to the front by shifting data if necessary (default false)
-cluster_size_limit
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... store at most the provided amount of bytes in a cluster (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-cluster_time_limit
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... store at most the provided number of milliseconds in a cluster (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)

Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... create a WebM file conforming to WebM DASH specification (default false)

Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... track number for the DASH stream (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... control how a track's FlagDefault is inferred (from 0 to 2) (default passthrough)

Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... Override major brand

Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... write zero-length name string in hdlr atoms within mdia and minf atoms (default false)
-encryption_key
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

E.......... The media encryption key (hex)
-encryption_kid
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

E.......... The media encryption key identifier (hex)
-encryption_scheme
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Configures the encryption scheme, allowed values are none, cenc-aes-ctr

-frag_duration
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Maximum fragment duration (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-frag_interleave
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Interleave samples within fragments (max number of consecutive samples, lower is tighter interleaving, but with more overhead) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-frag_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Maximum fragment size (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-fragment_index
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Fragment number of the next fragment (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-iods_audio_profile
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... iods audio profile atom. (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

-iods_video_profile
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... iods video profile atom. (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

-ism_lookahead
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Number of lookahead entries for ISM files (from 0 to 255) (default 0)
-movflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... MOV muxer flags (default 0)
-moov_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... maximum moov size so it can be placed at the begin (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-min_frag_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Minimum fragment duration (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-mov_gamma
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E.......... gamma value for gama atom (from 0 to 10) (default 0)
-movie_timescale
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set movie timescale (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1000)
-rtpflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... RTP muxer flags (default 0)
-skip_iods
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Skip writing iods atom. (default true)

Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

Parameter: E.......... use stream ids as track ids (default false)

Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Enable ID3v1 writing. ID3v1 tags are written in UTF-8 which may not be supported by most software. (default false)

Parameter: <dictionary>

E.......... set list of options for the RTP muxer
-initial_pause
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... do not start playing the stream immediately (default false)
-rtpflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... RTP muxer flags (default 0)

Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

ED......... set RTSP transport protocols (default 0)
-rtsp_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

.D......... set RTSP flags (default 0)
-allowed_media_types
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... set media types to accept from the server (default video+audio+data+subtitle)

-min_port
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... set minimum local UDP port (from 0 to 65535) (default 5000)
-max_port
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... set maximum local UDP port (from 0 to 65535) (default 65000)
-listen_timeout
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set maximum timeout (in seconds) to wait for incoming connections (-1 is infinite, imply flag listen) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-timeout
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

.D......... set timeout (in microseconds) of socket I/O operations (from INT_MIN to I64_MAX) (default 0)
-reorder_queue_size
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... set number of packets to buffer for handling of reordered packets (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-buffer_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

ED......... Underlying protocol send/receive buffer size (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)
-pkt_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Underlying protocol send packet size (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default 1472)
-user_agent
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... override User-Agent header (default "Lavf61.7.100")
-reference_stream
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set reference stream (default "auto")
-segment_format
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set container format used for the segments
-segment_format_options
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary>

E.......... set list of options for the container format used for the segments
-segment_list
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set the segment list filename
-segment_header_filename
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... write a single file containing the header

-segment_list_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set flags affecting segment list generation (default cache)

-segment_list_size
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set the maximum number of playlist entries (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-segment_list_type
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set the segment list type (from -1 to 4) (default -1)

-segment_atclocktime
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set segment to be cut at clocktime (default false)

-segment_clocktime_offset
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set segment clocktime offset (default 0)

-segment_clocktime_wrap_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set segment clocktime wrapping duration (default INT64_MAX)

-segment_time
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set segment duration (default 2)
-segment_time_delta
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set approximation value used for the segment times (default 0)

-min_seg_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set minimum segment duration (default 0)
-segment_times
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set segment split time points
-segment_frames
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set segment split frame numbers
-segment_wrap
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set number after which the index wraps (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-segment_list_entry_prefix
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set base url prefix for segments

-segment_start_number
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set the sequence number of the first segment (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-segment_wrap_number
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set the number of wrap before the first segment (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-strftime
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... set filename expansion with strftime at segment creation (default false)
-increment_tc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... increment timecode between each segment (default false)
-break_non_keyframes
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... allow breaking segments on non-keyframes (default false)

-individual_header_trailer
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... write header/trailer to each segment (default true)

-write_header_trailer
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... write a header to the first segment and a trailer to the last one (default true)

-reset_timestamps
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... reset timestamps at the beginning of each segment (default false)
-initial_offset
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set initial timestamp offset (default 0)
-write_empty_segments
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... allow writing empty 'filler' segments (default false)

-reference_stream
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set reference stream (default "auto")
-segment_format
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set container format used for the segments
-segment_format_options
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary>

E.......... set list of options for the container format used for the segments
-segment_list
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set the segment list filename
-segment_header_filename
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... write a single file containing the header

-segment_list_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set flags affecting segment list generation (default cache)

-segment_list_size
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set the maximum number of playlist entries (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-segment_list_type
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set the segment list type (from -1 to 4) (default -1)

-segment_atclocktime
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set segment to be cut at clocktime (default false)

-segment_clocktime_offset
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set segment clocktime offset (default 0)

-segment_clocktime_wrap_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set segment clocktime wrapping duration (default INT64_MAX)

-segment_time
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set segment duration (default 2)
-segment_time_delta
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set approximation value used for the segment times (default 0)

-min_seg_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set minimum segment duration (default 0)
-segment_times
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set segment split time points
-segment_frames
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set segment split frame numbers
-segment_wrap
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set number after which the index wraps (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-segment_list_entry_prefix
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set base url prefix for segments

-segment_start_number
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set the sequence number of the first segment (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-segment_wrap_number
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set the number of wrap before the first segment (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-strftime
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... set filename expansion with strftime at segment creation (default false)
-increment_tc
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... increment timecode between each segment (default false)
-break_non_keyframes
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... allow breaking segments on non-keyframes (default false)

-individual_header_trailer
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... write header/trailer to each segment (default true)

-write_header_trailer
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... write a header to the first segment and a trailer to the last one (default true)

-reset_timestamps
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... reset timestamps at the beginning of each segment (default false)
-initial_offset
Typ: string
Parameter: <duration>

E.......... set initial timestamp offset (default 0)
-write_empty_segments
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... allow writing empty 'filler' segments (default false)

-window_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... number of fragments kept in the manifest (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-extra_window_size
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... number of fragments kept outside of the manifest before removing from disk (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 5)

-lookahead_count
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... number of lookahead fragments (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 2)
-min_frag_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... minimum fragment duration (in microseconds) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 5000000)

-remove_at_exit
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... remove all fragments when finished (default false)
-serial_offset
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... serial number offset (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-oggpagesize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Set preferred Ogg page size. (from 0 to 65025) (default 0)
-pagesize
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... preferred page size in bytes (deprecated) (from 0 to 65025) (default 0)
-page_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

E.......... preferred page duration, in microseconds (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 1000000)
-spdif_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... IEC 61937 encapsulation flags (default 0)
-dtshd_rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... mux complete DTS frames in HD mode at the specified IEC958 rate (in Hz, default 0=disabled) (from 0 to 768000) (default 0)
-dtshd_fallback_time
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... min secs to strip HD for after an overflow (-1: till the end, default 60) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default 60)

-hash
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set hash to use (default "sha256")
-use_fifo
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Use fifo pseudo-muxer to separate actual muxers from encoder (default false)
-fifo_options
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary> E.......... fifo pseudo-muxer options

-brand
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... Override major brand
-empty_hdlr_name
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... write zero-length name string in hdlr atoms within mdia and minf atoms (default false)
-encryption_key
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

E.......... The media encryption key (hex)
-encryption_kid
Typ: string
Parameter: <binary>

E.......... The media encryption key identifier (hex)
-encryption_scheme
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Configures the encryption scheme, allowed values are none, cenc-aes-ctr

-frag_duration
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Maximum fragment duration (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-frag_interleave
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Interleave samples within fragments (max number of consecutive samples, lower is tighter interleaving, but with more overhead) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-frag_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Maximum fragment size (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-fragment_index
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Fragment number of the next fragment (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-iods_audio_profile
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... iods audio profile atom. (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

-iods_video_profile
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... iods video profile atom. (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

-ism_lookahead
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Number of lookahead entries for ISM files (from 0 to 255) (default 0)
-movflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... MOV muxer flags (default 0)
-moov_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... maximum moov size so it can be placed at the begin (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-min_frag_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Minimum fragment duration (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-mov_gamma
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

E.......... gamma value for gama atom (from 0 to 10) (default 0)
-movie_timescale
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... set movie timescale (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1000)
-rtpflags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E.......... RTP muxer flags (default 0)
-skip_iods
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Skip writing iods atom. (default true)
-use_editlist
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... use edit list (default auto)
-use_stream_ids_as_track_ids
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... use stream ids as track ids (default false)

-video_track_timescale
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... set timescale of all video tracks (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-write_btrt
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... force or disable writing btrt (default auto)

Typ: integer

E.......... Write producer reference time box with specified time source (from 0 to 2) (default 0)

E.......... force or disable writing tmcd (default auto)

Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... Write BEXT chunk. (default false)
-write_peak
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Write Peak Envelope chunk. (from 0 to 2) (default off)
-rf64
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Use RF64 header rather than RIFF for large files. (from -1 to 1) (default never)
-peak_block_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Number of audio samples used to generate each peak frame. (from 0 to 65536) (default 256)
-peak_format
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... The format of the peak envelope data (1: uint8, 2: uint16). (from 1 to 2) (default 2)
-peak_ppv
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Number of peak points per peak value (1 or 2). (from 1 to 2) (default 2)
-reserve_index_space
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... reserve a given amount of space (in bytes) at the beginning of the file for the index (cues) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-cues_to_front
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... move Cues (the index) to the front by shifting data if necessary (default false)
-cluster_size_limit
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... store at most the provided amount of bytes in a cluster (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-cluster_time_limit
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... store at most the provided number of milliseconds in a cluster (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)

-dash
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... create a WebM file conforming to WebM DASH specification (default false)
-dash_track_number
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... track number for the DASH stream (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)

-live
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... write files assuming it is a live stream (default false)
-allow_raw_vfw
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... allow raw VFW mode (default false)
-flipped_raw_rgb
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... store raw RGB bitmaps in VFW mode in bottom-up mode (default false)
-write_crc32
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... write a CRC32 element inside every Level 1 element (default true)
-default_mode
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... control how a track's FlagDefault is inferred (from 0 to 2) (default passthrough)
-adaptation_sets
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... Adaptation sets. Syntax: id=0,streams=0,1,2 id=1,streams=3,4 and so on
-live
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E.......... create a live stream manifest (default false)
-chunk_start_index
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... start index of the chunk (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-chunk_duration_ms
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... duration of each chunk (in milliseconds) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1000)

-utc_timing_url
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... URL of the page that will return the UTC timestamp in ISO format
-time_shift_buffer_depth
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Smallest time (in seconds) shifting buffer for which any Representation is guaranteed to be available. (from 1 to DBL_MAX) (default 60)

-minimum_update_period
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... Minimum Update Period (in seconds) of the manifest. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-chunk_start_index
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... start index of the chunk (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-header
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... filename of the header where the initialization data will be written
-audio_chunk_duration
Typ: string
Parameter: E.......... duration of each chunk in milliseconds (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 5000)

-method
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... set the HTTP method
-loop
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E.......... Number of times to loop the output: 0 - infinite loop (from 0 to 65535) (default 1)

Parameter: <string>

E.......... set SDL window title

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1024)
-live_start_index
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... segment index to start live streams at (negative values are from the end) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default -3)
-prefer_x_start
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... prefer to use #EXT-X-START if it's in playlist instead of live_start_index (default false)
-allowed_extensions
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... List of file extensions that hls is allowed to access (default "3gp,aac,avi,ac3,eac3,flac,mkv,m3u8,m4a,m4s,m4v,mpg,mov,mp2,mp3,mp4,mpeg,mpegts,ogg,ogv,oga,ts,vob,wav")

-extension_picky
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... Be picky with all extensions matching (default true)
-max_reload
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Maximum number of times a insufficient list is attempted to be reloaded (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 100)
-m3u8_hold_counters
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... The maximum number of times to load m3u8 when it refreshes without new segments (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1000)

-http_persistent
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... Use persistent HTTP connections (default true)
-http_multiple
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... Use multiple HTTP connections for fetching segments (default auto)
-http_seekable
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... Use HTTP partial requests, 0 = disable, 1 = enable, -1 = auto (default auto)
-seg_format_options
Typ: string
Parameter: <dictionary>

.D......... Set options for segment demuxer
-seg_max_retry
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... Maximum number of times to reload a segment on error. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-linespeed
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set simulated line speed (bytes per second) (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 6000)
-video_size
Typ: string
Parameter: <image_size> .D......... set video size, such as 640x480 or hd720.

-framerate
Typ: string
Parameter: <video_rate> .D......... set framerate (frames per second) (default "25")

-pattern_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set pattern type (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 4)
-start_number
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set first number in the sequence (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-start_number_range
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... set range for looking at the first sequence number (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 5)

-ts_from_file
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set frame timestamp from file's one (from 0 to 2) (default none)

Parameter: <image_size> .D......... set video size

-loop
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... force loop over input file sequence (default false)
-frame_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... force frame size in bytes (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-framerate
Typ: string
Parameter: <video_rate> .D......... set the video framerate (default "25")

Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... set video pixel format
-video_size

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D..A...... set sample rate (from 1000 to 999999) (default 44100)

Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

.D..A...... set max file size supported (in bytes) (from 0 to 1.84467e+19) (default 52428800)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D..A...... set sample rate (from 1000 to INT_MAX) (default 48000)
-layout
Typ: string
Parameter: <channel_layout> .D..A...... set channel layout (default "stereo")

-subsong
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D..A...... set subsong (from -2 to INT_MAX) (default auto)

Typ: string
Parameter: <image_size> .D......... set video size given a string such as 640x480 or hd720.

-pixel_format
Typ: string
Parameter: <pix_fmt>

.D......... set video pixel format (default none)
-framerate
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... set video frame rate
-sample_rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set audio sample rate (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-sample_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set audio sample size (from 0 to 16) (default 0)
-channels
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... set number of audio channels, such as 1 or 2 (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-audio_buffer_size
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... set audio device buffer latency size in milliseconds (default is the device's default) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-list_devices
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... list available devices (default false)
-list_options
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

.D......... list available options for specified device (default false)
-video_device_number
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... set video device number for devices with same name (starts at 0) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-audio_device_number
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... set audio device number for devices with same name (starts at 0) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-video_pin_name
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... select video capture pin by name
-audio_pin_name
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

E.......... select audio capture pin by name
-crossbar_video_input_pin_number
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... set video input pin number for crossbar device (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-crossbar_audio_input_pin_number
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... set audio input pin number for crossbar device (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-show_video_device_dialog
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... display property dialog for video capture device (default false)

-show_audio_device_dialog
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... display property dialog for audio capture device (default false)

-show_video_crossbar_connection_dialog
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... display property dialog for crossbar connecting pins filter on video device (default false)

-show_audio_crossbar_connection_dialog
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... display property dialog for crossbar connecting pins filter on audio device (default false)

-show_analog_tv_tuner_dialog
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... display property dialog for analog tuner filter (default false)

-show_analog_tv_tuner_audio_dialog
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... display property dialog for analog tuner audio filter (default false)

-audio_device_load
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... load audio capture filter device (and properties) from file

-audio_device_save
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... save audio capture filter device (and properties) to file

-video_device_load
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... load video capture filter device (and properties) from file

-video_device_save
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... save video capture filter device (and properties) to file

-use_video_device_timestamps
Typ: string
Parameter: .D......... use device instead of wallclock timestamps for video frames (default true)

-draw_mouse
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... draw the mouse pointer (from 0 to 1) (default 1)
-show_region
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... draw border around capture area (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-framerate
Typ: string
Parameter: <video_rate> .D......... set video frame rate (default "ntsc")

-video_size
Typ: string
Parameter: <image_size> .D......... set video frame size

-offset_x
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... capture area x offset (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-offset_y
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

.D......... capture area y offset (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-graph
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... set libavfilter graph
-graph_file
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... set libavfilter graph filename
-dumpgraph
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... dump graph to stderr
-video_size
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... A string describing frame size, such as 640x480 or hd720.
-framerate
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

.D......... (default "ntsc")
-sws_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... scaler flags (default bicubic)
-srcw
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... source width (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 16)
-srch
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... source height (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 16)
-dstw
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... destination width (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 16)
-dsth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... destination height (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 16)
-src_format
Typ: string
Parameter: <pix_fmt>

E..V....... source format (default yuv420p)
-dst_format
Typ: string
Parameter: <pix_fmt>

E..V....... destination format (default yuv420p)
-src_range
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... source is full range (default false)
-dst_range
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... destination is full range (default false)
-param0
Typ: string
Parameter: <double>

E..V....... scaler param 0 (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 123456)
-param1
Typ: string
Parameter: <double>

E..V....... scaler param 1 (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 123456)
-src_v_chr_pos
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... source vertical chroma position in luma grid/256 (from -513 to 1024) (default -513)
-src_h_chr_pos
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... source horizontal chroma position in luma grid/256 (from -513 to 1024) (default -513)
-dst_v_chr_pos
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... destination vertical chroma position in luma grid/256 (from -513 to 1024) (default -513)
-dst_h_chr_pos
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... destination horizontal chroma position in luma grid/256 (from -513 to 1024) (default -513)
-sws_dither
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... set dithering algorithm (from 0 to 6) (default auto)
-gamma
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... gamma correct scaling (default false)
-alphablend
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... mode for alpha -> non alpha (from 0 to 2) (default none)
-threads
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... number of threads (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-isr
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set input sample rate (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-in_sample_rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set input sample rate (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-osr
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set output sample rate (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-out_sample_rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set output sample rate (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-isf
Typ: string
Parameter: <sample_fmt> ....A...... set input sample format (default none)

-in_sample_fmt
Typ: string
Parameter: <sample_fmt> ....A...... set input sample format (default none)

-osf
Typ: string
Parameter: <sample_fmt> ....A...... set output sample format (default none)

-out_sample_fmt
Typ: string
Parameter: <sample_fmt> ....A...... set output sample format (default none)

-tsf
Typ: string
Parameter: <sample_fmt> ....A...... set internal sample format (default none)

-internal_sample_fmt
Typ: string
Parameter: <sample_fmt>

....A...... set internal sample format (default none)
-ichl
Typ: string
Parameter: <channel_layout> ....A...... set input channel layout

-in_chlayout
Typ: string
Parameter: <channel_layout> ....A...... set input channel layout

-ochl
Typ: string
Parameter: <channel_layout> ....A...... set output channel layout

-out_chlayout
Typ: string
Parameter: <channel_layout> ....A...... set output channel layout

-uchl
Typ: string
Parameter: <channel_layout> ....A...... set used channel layout

-used_chlayout
Typ: string
Parameter: <channel_layout> ....A...... set used channel layout

-clev
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set center mix level (from -32 to 32) (default 0.707107)
-center_mix_level
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set center mix level (from -32 to 32) (default 0.707107)
-slev
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set surround mix level (from -32 to 32) (default 0.707107)
-surround_mix_level
Typ: string
Parameter: ....A...... set surround mix Level (from -32 to 32) (default 0.707107)

-lfe_mix_level
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set LFE mix level (from -32 to 32) (default 0)
-rmvol
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set rematrix volume (from -1000 to 1000) (default 1)
-rematrix_volume
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set rematrix volume (from -1000 to 1000) (default 1)
-rematrix_maxval
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set rematrix maxval (from 0 to 1000) (default 0)
-flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

....A...... set flags (default 0)
-swr_flags
Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

....A...... set flags (default 0)
-dither_scale
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set dither scale (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-dither_method
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set dither method (from 0 to 71) (default 0)
-filter_size
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set swr resampling filter size (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 32)
-phase_shift
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set swr resampling phase shift (from 0 to 24) (default 10)
-linear_interp
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

....A...... enable linear interpolation (default true)
-exact_rational
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

....A...... enable exact rational (default true)
-cutoff
Typ: string
Parameter: <double>

....A...... set cutoff frequency ratio (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-resample_cutoff
Typ: string
Parameter: <double>

....A...... set cutoff frequency ratio (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
-resampler
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set resampling Engine (from 0 to 1) (default swr)
-precision
Typ: string
Parameter: <double>

....A...... set soxr resampling precision (in bits) (from 15 to 33) (default 20)
-cheby
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

....A...... enable soxr Chebyshev passband & higher-precision irrational ratio approximation (default false)
-min_comp
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set minimum difference between timestamps and audio data (in seconds) below which no timestamp compensation of either kind is applied (from 0 to FLT_MAX) (default FLT_MAX)
-min_hard_comp
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set minimum difference between timestamps and audio data (in seconds) to trigger padding/trimming the data. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0.1)
-comp_duration
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set duration (in seconds) over which data is stretched/squeezed to make it match the timestamps. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1)
-max_soft_comp
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... set maximum factor by which data is stretched/squeezed to make it match the timestamps. (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-async
Typ: float
Parameter: <float>

....A...... simplified 1 parameter audio timestamp matching, 0(disabled), 1(filling and trimming), >1(maximum stretch/squeeze in samples per second) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-first_pts
Typ: string
Parameter: <int64>

....A...... Assume the first pts should be this value (in samples). (from I64_MIN to I64_MAX) (default I64_MIN)
-matrix_encoding
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set matrixed stereo encoding (from 0 to 6) (default none)
-filter_type
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... select swr filter type (from 0 to 2) (default kaiser)
-kaiser_beta
Typ: string
Parameter: <double>

....A...... set swr Kaiser window beta (from 2 to 16) (default 9)
-output_sample_bits
Typ: string
Parameter: ....A...... set swr number of output sample bits (from 0 to 64) (default 0)

-isr
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set input sample rate (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-in_sample_rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set input sample rate (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-osr
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set output sample rate (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-out_sample_rate
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...... set output sample rate (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-isf
Typ: string
Parameter: <sample_fmt> ....A...... set input sample format (default none)

-in_sample_fmt
Typ: string
Parameter: <sample_fmt> ....A...... set input sample format (default none)

-osf
Typ: string
Parameter: <sample_fmt> ....A...... set output sample format (default none)

-out_sample_fmt

Parameter: <sample_fmt> ....A...... set output sample format (default none)

-tsf

-internal_sample_fmt

....A...... set internal sample format (default none)

Typ: string
Parameter: <flags>

E..V....... scaler flags (default bicubic)
-srcw
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... source width (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 16)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... source height (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 16)

Parameter: <int>

E..V....... destination width (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 16)
-dsth
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... destination height (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 16)
-src_format
Typ: string
Parameter: <pix_fmt>

E..V....... source format (default yuv420p)
-dst_format
Typ: string
Parameter: <pix_fmt>

E..V....... destination format (default yuv420p)
-src_range
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... source is full range (default false)
-dst_range
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... destination is full range (default false)
-param0
Typ: string
Parameter: <double>

E..V....... scaler param 0 (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 123456)
-param1
Typ: string
Parameter: <double>

E..V....... scaler param 1 (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 123456)

Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

E..V....... source vertical chroma position in luma grid/256 (from -513 to 1024) (default -513)

-dst_h_chr_pos

Parameter: <int>

Typ: integer

E..V....... set dithering algorithm (from 0 to 6) (default auto)

Parameter: <boolean>

E..V....... gamma correct scaling (default false)

...V....B.. Temporal Delimiter OBU (from 0 to 2) (default pass)

Typ: string

...V....B.. Set display tick rate (time_scale / num_units_in_display_tick) (from 0 to UINT32_MAX) (default 0/1)

...V....B.. specify which error status value to match (default Aa+Ba+Ca+erri+erru+err+Ab+Bb+Cb+A+B+C+a+b+res+notok+notres)

...V....B.. remove the extradata from the bitstream (from 0 to 1) (default 0)

...V....B.. List of unit types to pass through the filter.

...V....B.. List of unit types to remove in the filter.

...V....B.. Set colour primaries (table 6-7) (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

-matrix_coefficients

-amount
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

...VA...B..
-drop
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

...VA...B..
-dropamount
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

...VA...B.. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
-gain
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...B.. Gain, actual amplification is pow(10, gain/(20.0*256)) (from -32768 to 32767) (default 0)
-nb_out_samples
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...B.. set the number of per-packet output samples (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1024)
-n
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

....A...B.. set the number of per-packet output samples (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1024)
-pad
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

....A...B.. pad last packet with zeros (default true)
-p
Typ: string
Parameter: <boolean>

....A...B.. pad last packet with zeros (default true)
-frame_rate
Typ: string
Parameter: <rational>

....A...B.. set number of packets per second (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0/1)
-r
Typ: string
Parameter: <rational>

....A...B.. set number of packets per second (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0/1)
-color_primaries
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

...V....B.. select color primaries (from -1 to 12) (default auto)
-color_trc
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

...V....B.. select color transfer (from -1 to 18) (default auto)
-colorspace
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

...V....B.. select colorspace (from -1 to 9) (default auto)
-freq
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

...V....B.. (from 0 to 2) (default keyframe)
-ts
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

...VAS..B.. set expression for packet PTS and DTS (default "TS")
-pts
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

...VAS..B.. set expression for packet PTS
-dts
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

...VAS..B.. set expression for packet DTS
-duration
Typ: string
Parameter: <string>

...VAS..B.. set expression for packet duration (default "DURATION")
-time_base
Typ: string
Parameter: <rational>

...VAS..B.. set output timebase (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0/1)
-color_space
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

...V....B.. Set colour space (section 7.2.2) (from -1 to 7) (default -1)
-color_range
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

...V....B.. Set colour range (section 7.2.2) (from -1 to 1) (default -1)
-aud
Typ: integer
Parameter: <int>

...V....B.. Access Unit Delimiter NAL units (from 0 to 2) (default pass)

Video- und Audiofilter

=
video
input/output
Keine spezifischen Optionen
aap
other
